S06psp_2-3u:3_1: yāvan mahābrahmāṇo ye ceha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau parīttābhā yāvac chuddhāvāsakāyikāś

S06psp_2-3u:31_1: dharmān yojayati. evaṃdharmeṇa dharmān abhiṣyandayan pariṣyandayan paripūrayan parisphāran
S06psp_2-3u:31_2: pratyavekṣate nirātmakā hy ete sarvadharmā ātmātmīyavigatāḥ. tat kasya hetos?

S06psp_2-3u:33_0: yat kauśika bodhicittaṃ tat pariṇāmanācitte na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate. yat pariṇāmanācittaṃ

S06psp_2-3u:33_2: prajñāpāramitā yad evaṃ sarvadharmāṃś ca pratyavekṣate na ca kaṃcid dharmam abhiniviśate nopalabhate.
S06psp_2-3u:34: evam ukte śakro devānām indraḥ sthaviraṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:37: kathaṃ vā pariṇāmanācitte bodhicittaṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate?
S06psp_2-3u:38: kathaṃ bodhicitte pariṇāmanācittaṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate?

S06psp_2-3u:40_1: pariṇāmayati. iti hi yad acittaṃ tad acintyaṃ yad acintyaṃ tad acittam acittatācittatāyāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:40_2: pariṇāmayati. iyaṃ kauśika bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā.

S06psp_2-3u:84_2: ity aśūnyam iti nimittam ity animittam iti praṇihitam ity apraṇihitam iti na sthātavyam
S06psp_2-3u:84_4: bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣv apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu satyābhijñāsu samādhiṣu sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu
S06psp_2-3u:84_6: sarveṣu teṣu nityam iti na sthātavyam evam anityam iti sukham iti duḥkham ity ātmeti
S06psp_2-3u:84_7: anātmeti śāntam ity aśāntam iti viviktam ity aviviktam iti na sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:85: śūnyam iti aśūnyam iti nimittam ity animittam iti praṇihitam ity apraṇihitam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:86_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika srotaāpattiphalam asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitam iti na sthātavyam evaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:86_1: sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ pratyekabuddhatvam asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitam iti na sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:87: buddhatvam asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitam iti na sthātavyaṃ. srotaāpanno dakṣiṇīya iti na sthātavyam,
S06psp_2-3u:90: arhan pratyekabuddhas tathāgato dakṣiṇīya iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena. iti kṣāntigatam
S06psp_2-3u:91_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamāyāṃ bhūmau na sthātavyam.
S06psp_2-3u:91_1: evaṃ dvitīyāyāṃ bhūmau tṛtīyāyāṃ bhūmau caturthyāṃ bhūmau pañcamyāṃ bhūmau ṣaṣṭhyāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:91_2: bhūmau saptamyāṃ bhūmāv aṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau navamyāṃ bhūmau daśamyāṃ bhūmau na sthātavyam
S06psp_2-3u:91_3: upalambhayogena. prathamacittotpāde sthitvā dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam.
S06psp_2-3u:91_4: evaṃ śīlapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:91_6: paripūrayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena. bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmayiṣyāmīti
S06psp_2-3u:91_7: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena. bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramyāvinivartanīyabhūmau sthāsyāmīti,
S06psp_2-3u:92_0: evam api bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena. pañcābhijñāḥ paripūrayiṣyāmīti
S06psp_2-3u:92_1: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena. pañcasu bodhisattvābhijñāsu
S06psp_2-3u:93_0: buddhāṃś ca bhagavato darśanāya vandanāya pūjanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya
S06psp_2-3u:93_1: ca śrutvā ca tathatvāya pratipatsye pareṣāṃ ca dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena
S06psp_2-3u:93_2: mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena. yādṛśāni ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:93_3: buddhakṣetrāṇi tādṛśāni niṣpādayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na sthātavyam
S06psp_2-3u:93_4: upalambhayogena. sattvān anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripācayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena
S06psp_2-3u:93_5: mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena. aprameyeṣv asaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣv gatvā
S06psp_2-3u:93_6: tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān satkariṣyāmīti gurukariṣyāmīti mānayiṣyāmīti
S06psp_2-3u:94_0: evam api na sthātavyam aprameyān asaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S06psp_2-3u:94_1: pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na sthātavyaṃ. pañca cakṣūṃṣi utpādayiṣyāmīti
S06psp_2-3u:94_2: na sthātavyaṃ māṃsacakṣur divyacakṣuḥ prajñācakṣur dharmacakṣur buddhacakṣur utpādayiṣyāmīti
S06psp_2-3u:94_3: na sthātavyaṃ sarvasamādhīn niṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyaṃ. yena yena punaḥ samādhinākāṅkṣiṣyāmi
S06psp_2-3u:94_4: vikrīḍituṃ tena tena samādhinā vikrīḍiṣyāmīti na sthātavyaṃ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni niṣpādayiṣyāmīti
S06psp_2-3u:94_5: na sthātavyam. apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattir niṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam. daśatathāgatabalāni
S06psp_2-3u:94_6: niṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyaṃ. catvāri vaiśāradyāni niṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyaṃ.
S06psp_2-3u:94_7: catasraḥ pratisaṃvido niṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam. aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān
S06psp_2-3u:94_8: pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena. mahāmaitrīṃ
S06psp_2-3u:94_9: mahākaruṇāṃ niṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam. dvātriṃśac ca mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni kāye
S06psp_2-3u:94_10: niṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam. aśītyanuvyañjanāni niṣpādayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena
S06psp_2-3u:94_11: mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena. śraddhānusārī dharmānusāry aṣṭamakaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:94_12: srotaāpannaḥ saptakṛtvo bhavaparama iti na sthātavyam. kulaṃkula iti ekavīcika iti
S06psp_2-3u:94_13: na sthātavyam. samaśīrṣaḥ pudgala iti na sthātavyam. āyuḥkṣaye kleśakṣaye ca na sthātavyam.
S06psp_2-3u:94_14: srotaāpanno 'vinipātadharma iti na sthātavyaṃ. sakṛdāgāmī sakṛd imaṃ lokam āgamya
S06psp_2-3u:94_15: duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyāntaṃ kariṣyāmīti na sthātavyam. anāgāmy anāgāmiphalaṃ sākṣātkriyāyai
S06psp_2-3u:94_16: pratipanna iti na sthātavyam. anāgāmī tatraiva parinirvāyīti na sthātavyam. arhann
S06psp_2-3u:94_17: arhatphalaṃ sākṣātkriyāyai pratipanna iti na sthātavyam. arhann (PSP_2-3:10)
S06psp_2-3u:95_0: ihaivānupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāyīti na sthātavyam. pratyekabuddha iti na
S06psp_2-3u:95_1: sthātavyam. bodhisattvo 'tikramya śrāvakābhūmiṃ ca pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ ca bodhisattvabhūmau
S06psp_2-3u:95_2: ca sthāsyāmīti na sthātavyam. mārgajñatājñāne na sthātavyam upalambhayogena. sarvākāreṇa
S06psp_2-3u:95_4: 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya dharmacakraṃ pravartayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam.
S06psp_2-3u:96_0: evam api na sthātavyam. caturṣv ṛddhipādeṣv indriyeṣu sthitvā tathārūpaṃ samādhiṃ
S06psp_2-3u:96_1: samāpatsye yathārūpeṇa samādhinā gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān sthāsyāmīti na sthātavyam
S06psp_2-3u:96_2: upalambhayogena. aparimitaṃ ma āyuḥpramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:96_4: na sthātavyaṃ. yāvantaḥ pūrveṇa gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātava evaṃ dakṣiṇapaścimottareṇa
S06psp_2-3u:96_5: gaṅgānadivālukopamā lokadhātavas tāvat mamaikaikaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyatīti na
S06psp_2-3u:96_6: sthātavyam. vajramayo me trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur bhaviṣyatīti na sthātavyam.
S06psp_2-3u:97: yas taṃ gandhaṃ ghrāyeta tasya sarvakāyasya na rāgo bādheta,
S06psp_2-3u:100: na kasyacic chrāvakacittaṃ vā pratyekabuddhacittaṃ vā syāt,
S06psp_2-3u:101: sarve ca te sattvā niyatā bhaviṣyanty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06psp_2-3u:102: ye ca te sattvās taṃ gandhaṃ ghrāsyanti teṣāṃ na kaścid vyādhir bhaved iti evam api na sthātavyaṃ. tatra ca buddhakṣetre na rūpaśabdo,
S06psp_2-3u:106: na vijñānaśabdo bhaviṣyatīti na sthātavyam. na dānapāramitāyāḥ śabdo bhaviṣyatīti,
S06psp_2-3u:107: evaṃ na śīlapāramitāyā na kṣāntipāramitāyā na vīryapāramitāyā na dhyānapāramitāyā na prajñāpāramitāyāḥ śabdo bhaviṣyatīti na sthātavyam. na smṛtyupasthānaśabdo bhaviṣyatīti,
S06psp_2-3u:109: evaṃ na yāvat srotaāpannasakṛdāgāmyanāgāmyarhatpratyekabuddhabodhisattvabuddhaśabdo bhaviṣyatīti na sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:112: sarvadharmā nopalabdhāḥ. evaṃ hi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām upalambhayogena na sthātavyam.
S06psp_2-3u:114: kathaṃ punar bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam? iti.
S06psp_2-3u:115: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāya āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat: tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_2-3u:116: tvam āyuṣmañ śāriputra kva tathāgataḥ sthita iti
S06psp_2-3u:118_0: na kvacid āyuṣman subhūte tathāgataḥ sthitaḥ. apratiṣṭhitamānasaḥ sa khalu punas
S06psp_2-3u:118_1: tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sa na rūpe sthito na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu
S06psp_2-3u:118_2: na vijñāne sthito na saṃskṛte dhātau sthito nāsaṃskṛte dhātau sthitaḥ. evaṃ na vyastasamasteṣu
S06psp_2-3u:118_3: skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāṅgeṣu na pāramitāsu na bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu
S06psp_2-3u:118_4: nāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu nābhijñāsu na satyeṣu sthito na sarvaśūnyatāsu na
S06psp_2-3u:119: na balavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu sthito na sarvajñatāyāṃ sthitaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:120: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:121: evaṃ hy āyuṣmañ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ. yathā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho na rūpe sthito nāsthitaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:122_0: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne sthito nāsthitaḥ. evaṃ hy āyuṣmañ
S06psp_2-3u:122_1: śariputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ. sthāsyāmīty asthānayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:123: atha khalu tatra pariṣadi keṣāṃcid devaputrāṇām etad abhavat:
S06psp_2-3u:124_0: yāni tāni yakṣāṇāṃ yakṣarutāni yakṣapadāni yakṣamantritāni yakṣapravyāhṛtāni prajñāyante
S06psp_2-3u:124_1: tāni jalpyamānāni. idaṃ punar na vijñāyate yad āryasthaviraḥ subhūtiḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:125: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtis teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥiparivitarkam ājñāya tān devaputrān āmantrayāmāsa:
S06psp_2-3u:128: subhūtir āha: tathā hi devaputrā ekākṣaram apy atra na pravyāhriyate,
S06psp_2-3u:130: tan na vijñāyate, tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_2-3u:131_0: anakṣarā hi prajñāpāramitā tasmān nāsti jñātā na śrotā na deśayitā anakṣarā tathāgatānām
S06psp_2-3u:131_1: arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ bodhiḥ. tadyathāpi nāma devaputrās tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho
S06psp_2-3u:131_2: buddhanirmitaṃ nirmimīyāc catasraś ca pariṣado bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāḥ so 'bhinirmāya
S06psp_2-3u:131_3: tāsāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pariṣadāṃ dharmaṃ deśayet, tat kiṃ manyadhve?
S06psp_2-3u:132: devaputrā api nu tatra kiṃcid deśitaṃ vā śrutaṃ vājñātaṃ vā.
S06psp_2-3u:135_0: evam eva devaputrāḥ. sarvadharmā nirmitopamās tatra na kenacid deśitaṃ na kenacic
S06psp_2-3u:135_1: chrutaṃ na kenacid ājñātam. tadyathāpi nāma devaputrāḥ puruṣaḥ suptaḥ. svapnāntaragatas
S06psp_2-3u:135_2: tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ paśyed dharmaṃ deśayantaṃ. tat kiṃ manyadhve?
S06psp_2-3u:136: devaputrā api nu tatra kiṃcid deśitaṃ vā śrutaṃ vājñātaṃ vā.
S06psp_2-3u:139_0: evaṃ devaputrāḥ svapnopamāḥ. sarve dharmās tatra na kenacic chrutaṃ na kenacid deśitaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:139_1: na kenacid ājñātam. tadyathāpi nāma devaputrā dvau puruṣau parvatakandare sthitvā
S06psp_2-3u:139_2: buddhasya varṇaṃ bhāṣeyātāṃ dharmasya varṇaṃ bhāṣeyātāṃ saṃghasya varṇaṃ bhāṣeyātām.
S06psp_2-3u:139_3: tato dvayor api tayoḥ pratiśrutkāsvaro niścaret. tat kiṃ manyadhve?
S06psp_2-3u:140: devaputrā api nu tayā pratiśrutkayā dvitīyaḥ. pratiśrutkāśabdo vijñāpito bhavet.
S06psp_2-3u:143_0: evam eva devaputraḥ. sarvadharmāḥ pratiśrutkopamās tatra na kiṃcid deśyate na śrūyate
S06psp_2-3u:143_1: na vijñāyate. tadyathāpi nāma devaputrā dakṣo māyākāro vā māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe
S06psp_2-3u:143_2: tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ nirmimīyāc catasraś ca pariṣadaḥ so 'bhinirmāya
S06psp_2-3u:143_3: nirmitānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pariṣadāṃ dharmaṃ deśayet. tat kiṃ manyadhve?
S06psp_2-3u:144: devaputrā api nu tatra kenacid deśitaṃ vā śrutaṃ vā vijñātaṃ vā bhavet.
S06psp_2-3u:146: subhūtir āha: evam eva devaputrā māyopamāḥ sarvadharmā na tatra kaścid (PSP_2-3:13)
S06psp_2-3u:147: deśayitā na śrotā na vijñātā. iti paropadeśavaiyarthyam
S06psp_2-3u:148: atha khalu teṣāṃ devaputrāṇām etad abhavat:
S06psp_2-3u:152: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtis tān devaputrān etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:153: na hi devaputrā rūpaṃ gambhīraṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā,
S06psp_2-3u:154: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ gambhīraṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_2-3u:155_0: na rūpasya svabhāvo gambhiro na sūkṣmaḥ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇāṃ na
S06psp_2-3u:155_1: vijñānasya svabhāvo gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ. na cakṣuṣaḥ svabhāvo gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:155_2: na śrotasya na ghrāṇasya na jihvāyā na kāyasya na manasaḥ svabhāvo gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:155_3: na pṛthivīdhātoḥ. svabhāvo gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:156: nābdhātor na tejodhātor na vāyudhātor nākāśadhātor na vijñānadhātoḥ. svabhāvo gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ. na dānapāramitāyāḥ svabhāvo gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:157: na śīlapāramitāyā na kṣāntipāramitāyā na vīryapāramitāyā na dhyānapāramitāyā na prajñāpāramitāyāḥ svabhāvo gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ nādhyātmaśūnyatāyāḥ svabhāvo gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:158_0: na bahirdhāśūnyatāyā nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā yāvan nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāḥ svabhāvo
S06psp_2-3u:158_1: gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ. na smṛtyupasthānānāṃ svabhāvo gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ. evaṃ samyakprahāṇānām
S06psp_2-3u:158_2: ṛddhipādānām indriyāṇāṃ balānāṃ bodhyaṅgānām āryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya satyānām abhijñānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:158_3: caturṇām apramāṇānāṃ caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ catasṛṇām ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:158_4: caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛnāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādāśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:158_5: svabhāvo gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ na sarvasamādhidhāraṇīmukhānāṃ svabhāvo gambhiro na sūkṣmaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:159: yāvan na sarvākārajñatāyāḥ svabhāvo gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:160: atha khalu teṣāṃ devaputrāṇām etad abhavat:
S06psp_2-3u:161: na khalu punar asyāṃ dharmadeśanāyāṃ rūpaṃ prajñaptaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ prajñaptaṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:162: yāvan na dhātavo nāyatanāni na pratityasamutpādaḥ prajñapto na pāramitā prajñaptā na bodhipakṣā dharmāḥ prajñaptāḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:164: na sarvaśūnyatā na sarvasamādhayaḥ na sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni (PSP_2-3:14)
S06psp_2-3u:165_0: na daśatathāgatabalāni na vaiśāradyāni na pratisaṃvido nāveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ prajñaptāḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:165_1: nāpīha dharmadeśanāyāṃ srotaāpattiphalaṃ prajñaptaṃ na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ nānāgāmiphalaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:165_2: nārhattvaṃ na pratyekabuddhatvaṃ na bodhisattvatvaṃ prajñaptaṃ na bodhiḥ prajñaptā

S06psp_2-3u:203: tena khalu punar na rūpaṃ śūnyam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,

S06psp_2-3u:486: api nu tatra kaścit sattva utpanno vā niruddho vā?
S06psp_2-3u:487: devendra āha: no bhadanta subhūte, tat kasya hetoḥ? ādiśuddhatvāt sattvasya.
S06psp_2-3u:489: anena kauśika paryāyeṇa sattvānantatayā prajñāpāramitānantatā veditavyā. iti tatraiva sattvadhātūddeśikatāṃ paridīpayatīti samudaye dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ
S06psp_2-3u:491: atha khalu sendrakā devāḥ sabrahmakāḥ saprajāpatikāḥ sanārīnararṣigaṇās trir udānam udānayāmāsuḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:494_0: aho dharmasya dharmatā yeyaṃ subhūtinā sthavireṇa deśyate yad uta tathāgatānubhāvena
S06psp_2-3u:494_1: tathāgatādhiṣṭhānena sūcyate prabhāvyate prakāśyate tathāgatān eva tān bhagavan bodhisattvān
S06psp_2-3u:495: na ca nāma kaścid dharma upalabhyate rūpaṃ vā vedanā vā saṃjñā vā saṃskārā vā vijñānaṃ vā yāvat sarvākārajñatā vā,
S06psp_2-3u:496: kutaḥ punas trayāṇāṃ yānānāṃ vyavasthānaṃ prajñāyate śrāvakayānasya vā pratyekabuddhayānasya vā mahāyānasya vā.
S06psp_2-3u:497: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tān devaputrān āmantrayāmāsa: evam etad devaputrā evam etat,
S06psp_2-3u:498_0: yathā vācaṃ bhāṣadhve na ca nāma kaścid dharma upalabhyate rūpaṃ vā vedanā vā saṃjñā
S06psp_2-3u:498_1: vā saṃskārā vā vijñānaṃ vā yāvat sarvākārajñatā vā trayāṇāṃ ca yānānāṃ vyavasthānaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:498_2: prajñāyate śrāvakayānasya vā pratyekabuddhayānasya vā mahāyānasya vā. tathāgataḥ
S06psp_2-3u:498_3: sa devaputrā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhārayitavyo yo 'nayā prajñāpāramitayāvirahito
S06psp_2-3u:499: tathā hy atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ trīṇi yānāni vistareṇopadiṣṭāni śrāvakayānaṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānaṃ vā mahāyānaṃ vā. na cānyatra dānapāramitāyās tathāgata upalabhyate,
S06psp_2-3u:500_0: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyā na cānyatra
S06psp_2-3u:500_1: prajñāpāramitāyās tathāgata upalabhyate. na cānyatrādhyātmaśūnyatāyā na cānyatra
S06psp_2-3u:501_0: yāvan na cānyatrābhāvasvābhāvaśūnyatāyās tathāgata upalabhyate. na cānyatra smṛtyupasthānebhyas
S06psp_2-3u:501_3: tathāgata upalabhyate. na cānyatra sarvākārajñatāyās tathāgata upalabhyate. bodhisattvā
S06psp_2-3u:501_4: mahāsattvāś ca devaputrāḥ sarveṣv eva dharmeṣu śikṣante dānapāramitāyām ādiṃ kṛtvā
S06psp_2-3u:502_0: devaputrāḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tathāgata eveti vaktavyo yo 'nayā prajñāpāramitayāvirahitaś
S06psp_2-3u:502_1: carati. yadāhaṃ devaputrā dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike
S06psp_2-3u:502_2: dīpavatyāṃ rājadhānyām antarāyaṇamadhyagato dānapāramitayāvirahito bhaveyam. evaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:502_4: bhaveyam. evam adhyātmaśūnyatayāvirahito bhaveyam. evaṃ bahirdhāśānyatayādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayā
S06psp_2-3u:502_5: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayāvirahito bhaveyam. evaṃ smṛtyupasthānair avirahito bhaveyam.
S06psp_2-3u:502_7: dhyānaiś caturbir apramāṇaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir aṣṭādaśabhiś cāveṇikair buddhadharmaiḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:502_8: mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇayā cānyaiś cāpramāṇair buddhadharmair avirahito bhaveyaṃ tac
S06psp_2-3u:502_9: cānupalambhayogena. tadāhaṃ devaputrās tena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena vyākṛto;
S06psp_2-3u:503_0: bhaviṣyasi tvam anāgate 'dhvany asminn eva sahālokadhātav asaṃkhyaiḥ kalpaiḥ śākyamunir
S06psp_2-3u:503_1: nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ
S06psp_2-3u:503_2: puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyānāṃ ca buddho bhagavān.
S06psp_2-3u:505: atha khalu te devaputrā bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:506_0: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ sarvākārajñatāyā
S06psp_2-3u:506_1: anuparigrāhikā rūpasyāparigrahānutsargayogena. vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyāparigrahānutsargayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:507_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃś catasraḥ pariṣado bhikṣubhibhṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā bodhisattvān
S06psp_2-3u:507_1: mahāsattvāṃś caturo mahārājāṃś cāturmahārājakāyikāṃś ca devaputrān yāvad akaniṣṭhāṃś
S06psp_2-3u:508: ca sarvān sākṣiṇaḥ sthāpayitvā śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:509_0: ye kecit kauśika bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā vā kulaputrā
S06psp_2-3u:509_1: vā kuladuhitaro vā devaputrā devakanyā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti
S06psp_2-3u:509_2: vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti bhāvayiṣyanti parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyanti
S06psp_2-3u:510: ye ca sarvākārajñatācittenāvirahitā bhaviṣyanti teṣāṃ mārā vā mārakāyikā vā avatāraṃ na lapsyante. tat kasya hetos?
S06psp_2-3u:511: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś ca rūpaśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati. evaṃ vedanā saṃjñāsaṃskārāvijñānaśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_2-3u:512: na hi śūnyatā śūnyatāyām avatāraṃ labhate,
S06psp_2-3u:514_4: svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati. yāvat sarvākārajñatāśūnyataiva taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś
S06psp_2-3u:514_5: ca svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati. tat kasya hetos?
S06psp_2-3u:515: tathā hi na śūnyatā śūnyatāyām avatāraṃ labhate,
S06psp_2-3u:517: nāpraṇihitam apraṇihite 'vatāraṃ labhate. tat kasya hetos?
S06psp_2-3u:518: tathā hi teṣāṃ svabhāvo na saṃvidyate,
S06psp_2-3u:523_0: na khalu punaḥ kauśika teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā manuṣyo vāmanuṣyo vāvatāraṃ
S06psp_2-3u:523_1: lapsyate. tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś ca sarvasattvānām antike maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣā
S06psp_2-3u:524: na ca te kauśika kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā viṣamāparihāreṇa kālaṃ kariṣyanti tat kasya hetos?
S06psp_2-3u:525_0: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś ca dānapāramitāyāṃ caradbhiḥ sarvasattvāḥ
S06psp_2-3u:525_1: samyakparicaryayā upasthitāḥ. yair vā kauśika cāturmahārājakāyikair devaputrair iha
S06psp_2-3u:525_2: trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau trayastriṃśair vā yāmair vā tuṣitair vā nirmāṇaratibhir
S06psp_2-3u:525_3: vā paranirmitavaśavartibhir vā brahmakāyikair vā brahmapurohitair vā brahmapārṣadyair
S06psp_2-3u:525_4: vā yāvad akaniṣṭhair vā devaputrair anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpāditaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:525_5: na cāyaṃ prajñāpāramitā śrutā nodgrahītā na dhāritā na vācitā na paryavāptā,
S06psp_2-3u:526: tair devaputrair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā śrotavyodgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā yoniśaś ca manasikartavyā sarvajñatācittenāvirahitaiḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:528_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika ye kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyanti
S06psp_2-3u:528_1: dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti avirahitāḥ
S06psp_2-3u:529: na khalu punaḥ kauśika teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā śūnyāgāragatānāṃ vā abhyavakāśagatānāṃ vā utpathagatānāṃ vā bhayaṃ vā stambhitatvaṃ vā bhaviṣyati. tat kasya hetos?
S06psp_2-3u:530: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś cādhyātmaśūnyatā subhāvitā anupalambhayogena,
S06psp_2-3u:532: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā subhāvitā anupalambhayogena yāvad abhāvasvabhāvasunyatā subhāvitā anūpalambhayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:533_0: atha khalu tāvad eva trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau ye cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrās
S06psp_2-3u:533_1: trāyastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paramrmitavaśavartino yāvac chuddhāvāsakāyikā
S06psp_2-3u:534_0: vayaṃ bhagavaṃs teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca satatasamitaṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ
S06psp_2-3u:534_1: saṃvidhāsyāmaḥ ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti
S06psp_2-3u:534_2: likhiṣyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti avirahitāś ca bhaviṣyanti sarvajñatācittena. (PSP_2-3:38)
S06psp_2-3u:536: tathā hi bhagavan bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya nirayā ucchidyante,
S06psp_2-3u:537_0: tiryagyoniyamalokā asurāḥ kāyā manuṣyadāridryā upadravā upasargāḥ. sarve 'py ucchidyante.
S06psp_2-3u:537_1: bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmapathanāṃ loke prādurbhāvo
S06psp_2-3u:537_2: bhavati. caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ caturṇām apramāṇānāṃ catasṛṇām ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ dānapāramitāyāḥ
S06psp_2-3u:537_4: loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati adhyātmaśūnyatāyā bahirdhāśūnyatāyā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā
S06psp_2-3u:537_5: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati. caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:537_6: caturṇāṃ samyakprahāṇānāṃ caturṇām ṛddhipādānāṃ pañcānām indriyāṇāṃ pañcānāṃ balānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:537_7: saptānāṃ bodhyaṅgānām āryāṣṭāṅgikasya mārgasya caturṇām āryasatyānāṃ caturṇām apramāṇānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:537_8: ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛnāṃ pratisaṃvidām
S06psp_2-3u:537_9: aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati. anekeṣāṃ samādhīnām
S06psp_2-3u:537_10: anekeṣāṃ dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ sarvajñatāyā bodhisattvamārgasya loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:538: punar aparaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni loke prajñāyante,
S06psp_2-3u:542_0: cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrāḥ prajñāyante. evaṃ trāyastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:542_1: paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikā brahmapurohitā brahmapārṣadyā mahābrahmāṇo yāvad
S06psp_2-3u:543: punar aparaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya srotaāpattiphalaṃ prajñāyate,
S06psp_2-3u:544: srotaāpannaḥ. prajñāyate. evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmī anāgāmiphalam anāgāmī arhattvam arhal loke prajñāyate,
S06psp_2-3u:546: punar aparaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya sattvaparipākaḥ prajñāyate,
S06psp_2-3u:553_0: saṃgharatnaṃ prajñāyate. anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa boodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvayakṣagaruḍakiṃnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyeṇa
S06psp_2-3u:554: evam ukte bhagavāñ śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat: evam etat kauśikaivam etat,
S06psp_2-3u:555: bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya nirayatiryagyoniyamaloke gataya ucchidyante,
S06psp_2-3u:556_0: devadāridryaṃ manuṣyadāridryam upadravā upasargāḥ sarve 'py ucchidyante. bodhisattvaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:556_1: mahāsattvam āgamya daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati. daśānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:556_3: dharmāṇāṃ satyānām abhijñānāṃ sarvaśūnyatānāṃ sarvasamādhīnāṃ sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:556_5: sarvākārajñatāyā bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya loke prādurbhāvo bhavati. kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni
S06psp_2-3u:556_6: brāhmaṇamahāśālakulāni gṛhapatimahāśālakulāni bodhisattvaṃ mahāsāttvam āgamya loke prajñāyante,
S06psp_2-3u:558: cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devaputrāḥ prajñāyante,
S06psp_2-3u:560: evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmī anāgāmiphalam anāgāmī arhattvam arhaś ca loke prajñāyate,
S06psp_2-3u:566_0: buddharatnasya dharmaratnasya saṃgharatnasya bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya loke
S06psp_2-3u:566_1: prādurbhāvo bhavati tasmāt tarhi kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa
S06psp_2-3u:566_2: lokena satkartavyo gurukartavyo mānayitavyaḥ pūjayitavyaḥ satatasamitaṃ cātra nu
S06psp_2-3u:567: imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sa kauśika satkartavyāṃ gurukartavyāṃ mānayitavyāṃ pūjayitavyāṃ manyeta yo bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkartavyaṃ gurukartavyaṃ manyeta,
S06psp_2-3u:569: lokena satkartavyaḥ satatasamitaṃ cātra nu rakṣāvaraṇaguptiḥ saṃvidhātavyā. yaś ca kauśika imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratipūrṇaṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:570: tadyathāpi nāma ikṣuvanaṃ vā naḍavanaṃ vā veṇuvanaṃ vā śaravanaṃ vā sālivanaṃ vā tilavanaṃ vā kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed,
S06psp_2-3u:571_0: yaś ca prathamacittotpādikaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam avirahitaṃ ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ
S06psp_2-3u:571_1: satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pujayed ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati tat
S06psp_2-3u:572: tathā hi na kauśika śrāvakapratyekabuddhān āgamya bodhisattvās tathāgatāś cārhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke prajñāyante,
S06psp_2-3u:573: bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ punar āgamya śrāvakapratyekabuddhās tathāgatāś cārhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke prajñāyante,
S06psp_2-3u:574_0: tasmāt tarhi kauśika sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ satkartavyo
S06psp_2-3u:574_1: gurukartavyo mānayitavyaḥ pūjayitavyaḥ satatasamitaṃ cātra nu rakṣāvaraṇaguptiḥ saṃvidhātavyā.
S06psp_2-3u:575: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:576: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad amī bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇantaḥ paryavāpnuvanto dhārayanto vācayanto yoniśaś ca manasikurvantaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:578: sattvāṃś ca paripācayanti buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayanti,
S06psp_2-3u:579: buddhakṣetrāc ca buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmanti buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsanāya,
S06psp_2-3u:580_0: yaiś ca kuśalamūlair ākāṅkṣeyus tān buddhān bhagavataḥ pūjayituṃ taiḥ pūjayeyus.
S06psp_2-3u:580_1: tac caiṣāṃ tathaiva ṛdhyate. yaṃ ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antike sthitvā dharmaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:580_2: śṛṇvanti sa caiṣāṃ dharmas tāvad eva na pramuṣyate yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06psp_2-3u:580_3: abhisaṃbuddhāḥ. iti kulasaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇanti jananīsaṃpadaṃ ca parivārasaṃpadaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:580_4: ca lakṣaṇasaṃpadaṃ ca prabhāsaṃpadaṃ ca cakṣuḥsaṃpadaṃ ca svarasaṃpadaṃ ca samādhisaṃpadaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:581: ātmānaṃ buddhavigrahaṃ nirmāya lokadhātor lokadhātuṃ saṃkrāmanti,
S06psp_2-3u:582_0: yatra buddhānāṃ bhagavatām utpādo nāsti te tatra gatvā dānapāramitāyā varṇaṃ bhāṣante.
S06psp_2-3u:582_1: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā
S06psp_2-3u:582_2: varṇaṃ bhāṣante. adhyātmaśūnyatāyā varṇaṃ bhāṣante. evaṃ bahirdhāśūnyatāyā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā
S06psp_2-3u:582_3: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā varṇaṃ bhāṣante. dhyānānāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣante. apramāṇānām
S06psp_2-3u:582_4: ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣante. smṛtyupasthānānāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣante. evaṃ samyakprahāṇānām
S06psp_2-3u:582_5: ṛddhipādānām indriyāṇāṃ balānāṃ bodhyaṅgānām āryāṣṭāṅgikasya mārgasya varṇaṃ bhāṣante.
S06psp_2-3u:582_6: caturṇām āryasatyānām abhijñānāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:582_7: yāvad aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣante. upāyakuśalena ca dharmaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:583: śrāvakayānena pratyekabuddhayānena buddhayānena. iti nirodhe dharmajñānam
S06psp_2-3u:584: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:585_0: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad anayā gambhīrayā prajñāpāramitāyā parigṛhītayā sarvāḥ pāramitāḥ
S06psp_2-3u:585_1: parigṛhīta bhavanti. yad uta dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā
S06psp_2-3u:585_2: dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā sarve bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni
S06psp_2-3u:585_4: pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ yāvad vyastasamastāḥ skandhadhātava āyatanāni
S06psp_2-3u:585_5: pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni ca parigṛhītāni bhavanti. srotaāpattiphalaṃ parigṛhītaṃ bhavati.
S06psp_2-3u:585_6: evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ pratyekabodhiḥ sarvākārajñatā parigṛhitā bhavati.
S06psp_2-3u:586: evam ukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:587_0: prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītayā sarvāḥ pāramitāḥ parigṛhitā bhavanti. evaṃ sarve bodhipakṣyā
S06psp_2-3u:587_2: satyābhijñāḥ sarve kuśalāḥ karmapathā daśabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido
S06psp_2-3u:589_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitayā udgṛhītayā dhāritayā vācitayā paryavāptayā
S06psp_2-3u:589_1: likhitayā yoniśo manasikṛtayā yān guṇān sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā pratilabhate
S06psp_2-3u:589_2: dṛṣṭa eva dharme tān śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te. evaṃ bhagavann
S06psp_2-3u:589_3: iti śakro devānām indro bhagavataḥt pratyaśroṣīt bhagavān etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:590_0: yaḥ kaścit kauśikānyatīrthikaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā māro vā mārakāyikā vā devatā
S06psp_2-3u:590_1: abhimāniko vā pudgalo bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam itaḥ prajñāpāramitāto vivecayitukāmo bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:594: teṣāṃ vivecayitukāmānāṃ vivaditukāmānāṃ vigrahītukāmānāṃ virodhayitukāmānām utpannotpannā vigrahā vivādā virodhāḥ kṣipraṃ punar evāntardhāsyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:595: teṣāṃ vivecayitukāmānāṃ vigrahītukāmānāṃ vivaditukāmānāṃ virodhayitukāmānāṃ na te 'bhiprāyāḥ paripūriṃ gamiṣyanti. tat kasya hetos?
S06psp_2-3u:596: tathā hi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dīrgharātraṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ caratā,
S06psp_2-3u:597_0: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:597_1: caratā. yeṣāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sattvā dīrgharātraṃ vigrahān vivādān virodhān āpadyante te
S06psp_2-3u:597_2: 'dhyātmikabāhyā dharmāḥ sarve sarvadā parityaktā. yeṣāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sattvā dīrgharātraṃ
S06psp_2-3u:597_3: sattvadauḥśīlyam āpadyante tān bodhisattvo mahāsattva ādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajya
S06psp_2-3u:597_4: tān sattvān śīle pratiṣṭhāpayati. yeṣāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sattvā dīrgharātraṃ krodhavyāpādavihiṃsām
S06psp_2-3u:597_5: āpadyante tān bodhisattvo mahāsattva ādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajya tān sattvān
S06psp_2-3u:597_6: kṣāntau pratiṣṭhāpayati. yeṣāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sattvā dīrgharātraṃ kausīdyam āpadyante tān
S06psp_2-3u:597_7: bodhisattvo mahāsattva ādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajya tān sattvān vīryapāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:597_8: pratiṣṭhāpayati. yeṣāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sattvā dīrgharātraṃ vikṣiptacittam āpadyante tān bodhisattvo
S06psp_2-3u:597_9: mahāsattva ādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajya tān sattvān dhyāne pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06psp_2-3u:597_10: yeṣāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sattvā dīrgharātraṃ dauṣprajñām āpadyante tān bodhisattvo mahāsattva
S06psp_2-3u:597_11: ādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajya tān sattvān mahāprajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06psp_2-3u:597_12: yeṣāṃ kṛtaśaḥ kauśika sattvā dīrgharātraṃ saṃsāre saṃsaranti yad utānunayapratighaparyavasthāne
S06psp_2-3u:598: upāyakauśalyena teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ vinīya tān sattvāṃś caturṣu dhyāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati. caturṣv apramāṇeṣu catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_2-3u:599_0: caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati. evaṃ samyakprahāneṣv ṛddhipādeṣv indriyeṣu
S06psp_2-3u:599_1: baleṣu vaiśāradyeṣv āryāṣṭāṅgeṣu mārgeṣu śūnyatāyāṃ vānimitte 'praṇihite samādhidhāraṇīmukheṣu
S06psp_2-3u:599_2: ca pratiṣṭhāpayati. caturṣv āryasatyeṣv abhijñāsu daśabalavaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvitsv
S06psp_2-3u:599_3: aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati. srotaāpattiphale sakṛdāgāmiphale
S06psp_2-3u:599_5: samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati. ime te kauśika bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhisattvacārikāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:599_6: carato dṛṣṭā dhārmikā guṇānuśaṃsā bhaviṣyanti. saṃparāye cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06psp_2-3u:599_7: abhisaṃbudhyate. dharmacakraṃ pravartya sattvān yathāpraṇidhāne pratiṣṭhāpya nirupadhiśeṣe
S06psp_2-3u:599_8: nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāpayiṣyanti. ime kauśika bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sāmparāyikā
S06psp_2-3u:600: punar aparaṃ kauśika yasmin pṛthivīpradeśe kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imāṃ prajñāpāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:601_0: na tatra pṛthivīpradeśe mārā vā mārakāyikā vā devatā anyatīrthikā vā parivrājakā
S06psp_2-3u:601_1: vā ābhimānikā vā pudgalāḥ śakṣyanti cittavikṣepaṃ kartuṃ asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:601_2: vigrahāya vivādāya virodhāya. uttare ca teṣāṃ guṇānuśaṃsā bhaviṣyanti yad utāsyāḥ
S06psp_2-3u:601_3: prajñāpāramitāyāḥ śravaṇenānupūrveṇa tribhir yānair niryāya duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:601_4: tadyathāpi nāma kauśika maghi nām' auṣadhī tatra āśīviṣeṇa jantunā bubhukṣitenāhārārthinā
S06psp_2-3u:601_5: āhāragaveṣiṇā kaścid eva prāṇakajāto dṛṣṭo bhavet,
S06psp_2-3u:602: sa taṃ prāṇakajātaṃ punaḥ khāditukāmaḥ prāṇakajātam anudhāvet.
S06psp_2-3u:603: atha khalu sa prāṇajātaḥ yena sā maghi nām' auṣadhi tenopasaṃkrāmed atha sa āśīviṣas tasyā auṣadhyā gandhena pratyudāvartate. tat (PSP_2-3:44)
S06psp_2-3u:605_0: tathā hi tasyā auṣadhyā bhaiṣajyaguṇaḥ yat tasyāśīviṣasya tad viṣam abhibhavati.
S06psp_2-3u:605_1: evaṃ balavatī hi sā kauśika auṣadhī evam eva kauśika yaḥ kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā
S06psp_2-3u:605_2: vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś
S06psp_2-3u:605_3: ca manasikariṣyati. tatra kauśika ye utpannotpannā vigrahā vivādā virodhā bhaviṣyanti
S06psp_2-3u:605_4: te prajñāpāramitāyās tejasā prajñāpāramitāyā balena kṣipram evāntardhāsyanty upaśamiṣyanti
S06psp_2-3u:605_5: yato yata evotpatsyante tatra tatraivāntardhāsyanti na vivardhiṣyanty upaśamiṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:608: tathā hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā sarvadharmāṇam upaśamayitrī na vivardhikā, katameṣāṃ dharmāṇām?
S06psp_2-3u:609_0: yad uta rāgasya doṣasya mohasyāvidyāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya nāmarūpaṣaḍāyatanasparśavedanātṛṣṇopādānabhavajātijarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyānām
S06psp_2-3u:609_2: ātmadṛṣṭeḥ sattvadṛṣṭer jīvadṛṣṭeḥ poṣadṛṣṭeḥ puruṣadṛṣṭeḥ pudgaladṛṣṭer manujadṛṣṭer
S06psp_2-3u:609_3: mānavadṛṣṭeḥ kārakadṛṣṭer vedakadṛṣṭer jānakadṛṣṭeḥ paśyakadṛṣṭer ucchedadṛṣṭeḥ śāśvatadṛṣṭer
S06psp_2-3u:609_4: astidṛṣṭer nāstidṛṣṭer yāvat sarvadṛṣṭikṛtānāṃ mātsaryadauḥśīlyavyāpādasya kauśīdyasya
S06psp_2-3u:609_11: sarvākārajñatāgrāhasya nirvāṇagrāhasyopaśamayitrī na vivardhikā. iti mārge dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ
S06psp_2-3u:610: atha khalu ya iha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mahārājāno (PSP_2-3:45)
S06psp_2-3u:611_0: lokapālāḥ śakrā devendrā ye ca brahmāṇo brahmā ca sahāpatir yāvad akaniṣṭhā devaputrās
S06psp_2-3u:611_1: te satatasamitaṃ tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyanti
S06psp_2-3u:611_2: yatra kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati
S06psp_2-3u:611_3: paryavāpsyati likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati. ye 'pi te daśasu
S06psp_2-3u:611_4: dikṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti te 'pi tasya kulaputrasya
S06psp_2-3u:611_5: vā kuladuhitur vā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyanti ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati
S06psp_2-3u:611_6: dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati
S06psp_2-3u:612_1: vivardhiṣyate na parihāsyati anupalambhayogena. adhyātmaśūnyatayā vivardhiṣyate na
S06psp_2-3u:612_4: vivardhiṣyate na parihāsyati. apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattibhir vivardhiṣyate na parihāsyati.
S06psp_2-3u:612_5: satyābhijñābhir daśabalair vaiśāradyaiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir āveṇikair buddhadharmair
S06psp_2-3u:612_6: vivardhiṣyate na parihāsyati anupalambhayogena. sarvasamādhibhiḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhair
S06psp_2-3u:613: yāvat sarvākārajñatayā vivardhiṣyate na parihāsyati anupalambhayogena. iti mārge dharmajñānam
S06psp_2-3u:614: sa ādeyavacanaś ca mitavacanaś ca bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:622: ye 'pi cānye prāṇātipātāt prativiratā bhaviṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:627: cānye 'dattādānāt prativiratā bhaviṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:631: ye 'pi cānye kāmamithyācārāt prativiratā bhaviṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:635: ye 'pi cānye mṛṣāvādāt prativiratā bhaviṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:639: ye 'pi cānye piśunavacanāt prativiratā bhaviṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:643: ye 'pi cānye paruṣavacanāt prativiratā bhaviṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:647: ye 'pi cānye saṃbhinnapralāpāt prativiratā bhaviṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:651: ye 'pi cānye 'bhidhyāyāḥ prativiratā bhaviṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:655: ye 'pi cānye vyāpādāt prativiratā bhaviṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:659: ye 'pi cānye mithyādṛṣṭeḥ prativiratā bhaviṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī (PSP_2-3:47)
S06psp_2-3u:663: dānapāramitāyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate. ye 'pi cānye dānapāramitāyāṃ caranti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:667: ye 'pi cānye śīlapāramitāyāṃ caranti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:671: ye 'pi cānye kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caranti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:675: ye 'pi cānye vīryapāramitāyāṃ caranti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:679: ye 'pi cānye dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caranti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:683: ye 'pi cānye prajñāpārmitāyāṃ caranti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:686: adhyātmaśūnyātāyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate. ye 'pi cānye 'dhyātmaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayanti teṣām api varṇavādi bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:687: ātmanā ca bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ pratiṣṭhito bhaviṣyati, parāṃś ca (PSP_2-3:48)
S06psp_2-3u:690: ye 'pi cānye bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ bhāvayanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:694: ye 'pi cānye 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ bhāvayanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:695: ātmanā ca yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ pratiṣṭhito bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:698: ye 'pi cānye 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:702: ye 'pi cānye sarvasamādhisamāpattīḥ samāpadyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:706: ye 'pi cānye dhāraṇīpratilabdhā bhavanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:710: ye 'pi cānye prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadya viharanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:711: ātmanā ca dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpatsyate yāvat tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpatsyate. ātmanā ca caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpatsyate,
S06psp_2-3u:714: ye 'pi cānye caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadya viharanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:719: samāpadyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:723: ye 'pi cānye karuṇāmuditopekṣāḥ samāpadyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:727: ye 'pi cānye ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpadyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:728: ātmanā ca vijñānānantyāyatanaṃ samāpatsyate. ātmanā cākiṃcanyāyatanaṃ samāpatsyate. ātmanā ca naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ upasaṃpadya vihariṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:731: ye 'pi cānye naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:735: ye 'pi cānye smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:736: evam ātmanā ca catvāri samyakprahāṇāni bhāvayiṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:741: ye 'pi cānye mārgaṃ bhāvayanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:745: ye 'pi cānye catvāry āryasatyāni bhāvayanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:749: ye 'pi cānye śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitān samādhīn bhāvayanti teṣām api varṇavādi bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:754: ye 'pi cānye 'ṣṭavimokṣān samāpadyante teṣāṃ api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:758: ye 'pi cānye navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīḥ samāpadyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:759: ātmanā ca daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ samāpatsyate,
S06psp_2-3u:760_0: parāṃś ca daśatathāgatabaleṣu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu samādāpayiṣyati
S06psp_2-3u:760_1: daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate,
S06psp_2-3u:761: ye 'pi cānye daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ samāpadyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:764: aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate,
S06psp_2-3u:765: ye 'pi cānye 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:769: ye 'pi cānye 'saṃmoṣadharmatāyāṃ pratiṣṭāpitā bhavanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:771: parāṃś ca sarvākārajñatāyāṃ samādāpayiṣyati sarvākārajñatāyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate,
S06psp_2-3u:772: ye 'pi cānye sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pratiṣṭhitā bhavanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ. iti mārge 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ
S06psp_2-3u:773_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran yad dānaṃ dadāti
S06psp_2-3u:773_1: tat sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty anupalambhayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:773_2: yac chīlaṃ rakṣati tat sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty (PSP_2-3:51)
S06psp_2-3u:774_0: anupalambhayogena. yāṃ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayati tāṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:774_1: samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty anupalambhayogena. yad vīryam ārabhate tat sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:774_2: kṛtvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty anupalambhayogena. yad dhyānaṃ samāpadyate
S06psp_2-3u:774_3: tat sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty anupalambhayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:774_4: yāṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayati tāṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S06psp_2-3u:774_5: pariṇāmayaty anupalambhayogena. evaṃ carataḥ kauśika kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur
S06psp_2-3u:774_6: vā ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu smṛtir evam utpadyate:
S06psp_2-3u:778: na ca me buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhanaṃ bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:779: na ca sarvajñatāṃ pratilapsye. tasyaivaṃ bhavati: yady ahaṃ śīlaṃ na rakṣiṣyāmi,
S06psp_2-3u:783: kuta eva sarvajñatāpratilābhas. tasyaivaṃ bhavati: yady ahaṃ kṣāntiṃ na bhāvayiṣyāmi,
S06psp_2-3u:787: yayā rūpasaṃpadā bodhisattvacārikāṃ me carataḥ. sattvāḥ saha darśanena niyatā bhaviṣyanty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06psp_2-3u:790: kutaḥ punaḥ sarvajñatāṃ pratilapsye. tasyaivaṃ bhavati: saced ahaṃ kusīdo bhaviṣyāmi,
S06psp_2-3u:792: na vīryam ārapsye kathaṃ buddhadharmān paripūrayiṣyāmi,
S06psp_2-3u:794: tasyaivaṃ bhavati: saced ahaṃ vikṣiptacitto bhaviṣyāmi,
S06psp_2-3u:798: kutaḥ punaḥ sarvajñatāṃ pratilapsye. tasyaivaṃ bhavati: saced ahaṃ duṣprajño bhaviṣyāmi,
S06psp_2-3u:799: prajñopāyakauśalyena śrāvakabhūmiṃ pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ cātikramya sattvān paripācya buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhya sarvajñatām abhisaṃboddhuṃ nāhaṃ śikṣiṣyāmi sa evaṃ pratisaṃśikṣate,
S06psp_2-3u:803_0: evaṃ dauḥśīlyavaśena śīlapāramitāṃ vyāpādavaśena kṣāntipāramitāṃ kauśīdyavaśena vīryapāramitāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:803_1: vikṣepavaśena dhyānapāramitāṃ dauṣprajñāvaśena prajñāpāramitāṃ na paripūrayeyaṃ.
S06psp_2-3u:803_2: aparipūrayan dānapāramitām evaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntiṃ vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ cāparipūrayan
S06psp_2-3u:803_3: na niryāsyāmi sarvākārajñatāyām. evaṃ hi kauśika sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadharmikān
S06psp_2-3u:803_4: sāṃparāyikāṃś ca guṇānuśaṃsān pratilabhate ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati vācayiṣyati
S06psp_2-3u:803_5: paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:806: evam ukte śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:807: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ paridamanāya pariṇamanāya ca pratyupasthitā.
S06psp_2-3u:809: kathaṃ punaḥ kauśika prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ paridamanāya pariṇamanāya ca pratyupasthitā?
S06psp_2-3u:810: evam ukte śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:811: iha bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo laukikyāṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ caran buddhebhyo bhagavadbhyaḥ pratyekabuddhebhyaḥ śrāvakebhyo dānāṃ dadāti. tasyaivaṃ bhavati:
S06psp_2-3u:812_1: sa etena dānenānupāyakauśalyenonnatiṃ gacchati. tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
S06psp_2-3u:815: sa tenonnatiṃ gacchati. tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya laukikīṃ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayata evaṃ bhavaty:
S06psp_2-3u:818: sa tenonnatiṃ gacchati. tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya laukikaṃ vīryam ārambhamāṇasyaivaṃ bhavati:
S06psp_2-3u:821: sa tenonnatiṃ gacchati. tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya laukikaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyamānasyaivaṃ bhavaty:
S06psp_2-3u:824: sa tenonnatiṃ gacchati. tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya (PSP_2-3:53)
S06psp_2-3u:825: laukikyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato 'nupāyakauśalyenaivaṃ bhavaty: ahaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carāmi,
S06psp_2-3u:827: sa tenonnatiṃ gacchati. tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya laukikyāṃ smṛtyupasthānabhāvanāyāṃ sthitasyaivaṃ bhavaty:
S06psp_2-3u:849_0: sa tenāhaṃkāramamakārābhiniveśenonnatiṃ gacchati. evaṃ hi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
S06psp_2-3u:849_1: laukikeṣu dharmeṣu carann unnatiṃ gacchati. ahaṃkāramamakārābhiniveśena. tasya khalu
S06psp_2-3u:849_2: punaḥ prajñāpāramitā paridamanāya pariṇāmanāya ca pratyupasthitā bhavati.
S06psp_2-3u:850: iha punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo lokottareṣu dharmeṣu caran dānaṃ dadad dāyakaṃ nopalabhate,
S06psp_2-3u:852_0: deyaṃ ca nopalabhate. evaṃ hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran paridamanāya
S06psp_2-3u:852_1: pratyupasthito bhavati pariṇāmanāya. evaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣan kṣāntiṃ saṃpādayamāno vīryam
S06psp_2-3u:852_2: ārambhamāṇo dhyānaṃ dhyāyan prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan prajñāṃ nopalabhate. evaṃ smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgān
S06psp_2-3u:853: āryasatyāny abhijñāṃ bhāvayan nopalabhate. balāni vaiśāradyāṃ pratisaṃvidaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:854_0: aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān bhāvayan nopalabhate. sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvasamādhin sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni
S06psp_2-3u:854_1: bhāvayan nopalabhate. evaṃ mahāmaitrīṃ mahākaruṇāṃ ca bhāvayan nopalabhate yāvat
S06psp_2-3u:854_2: sarvākārajñatāṃ bhāvayan nopalabhate. evaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:854_3: caran paridamanāya pariṇāmanāya ca pratyupasthito bhavati. iti sarvato damananamanakāritram
S06psp_2-3u:856: atha khalu bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:857_0: yo hi kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇan
S06psp_2-3u:857_1: vā dhārayan vā vācayan vā paryavāpnuvan vā pravartayan vā svādhyāyan vā yoniśo manasikurvan
S06psp_2-3u:857_2: vā saṃgrāmaśīrṣam ārūḍhaḥ saṃgrāme vartamāne saṃgrāme 'vatīrṇo vā śayito vātikrānto
S06psp_2-3u:857_3: vā niṣaṇṇo vā sthito vā syāt,
S06psp_2-3u:858_0: asthānaṃ kauśikānavakāśo yat tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām
S06psp_2-3u:858_1: udgṛhṇato dhārayato vācayataḥ paryavāpnuvataḥ pravartayataḥ svādhyāyato yoniśo manasikurvato
S06psp_2-3u:858_2: vā kaścid eva kāṇḍaṃ vā śastraṃ vā loṣṭaṃ vā kṣipet kṣiptāni vā tasya tāni śarīre
S06psp_2-3u:859: paropakramena vāsya jīvitāntarāyo bhaven naitat sthānaṃ vidyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_2-3u:860_0: tathā hi tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā dīrgharātram iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā
S06psp_2-3u:860_1: ātmano rāgakāṇḍāni rāgaśastrāṇi nirjitāni bhavanti. pareṣām api rāgakāṇḍāni rāgaśastrāṇi
S06psp_2-3u:860_2: nirjitāni. ātmano doṣakāṇḍāni doṣaśastrāni mohakāṇḍāni mohaśastrāṇi nirjitāni. pareṣām
S06psp_2-3u:860_3: api doṣakāṇḍāni doṣaśastrāṇi mohakāṇḍāni mohaśastrāṇi nirjitām. ātmano dṛṣṭikṛtakāṇḍāni
S06psp_2-3u:860_4: dṛṣṭikṛtaśastrāṇi nirjitāni pareṣām api dṛṣṭikṛtakāṇḍāni dṛṣṭikṛtaśastrāṇi nirjitāni.
S06psp_2-3u:860_5: ātmanaḥ paryutthānakāṇḍāni paryutthānaśastrāṇi nirjitāni. pareṣām api paryutthānakāṇḍāni
S06psp_2-3u:860_6: paryutthānaśastrāṇi nirjitāni. ātmano 'nuśayakāṇḍāny anuśayaśastrāṇi nirjitāni. pareṣām
S06psp_2-3u:860_7: apy anuśayakāṇḍāny anuśayaśastrāṇi nirjitāni. anena kauśika paryāyeṇa tasya kulaputrasya
S06psp_2-3u:860_8: vā kuladuhitur vā kāṇḍaṃ vā śastraṃ vā śarīre kṣiptaṃ na patati. iti kleśanirjayakāritram
S06psp_2-3u:861: punar aparaṃ kauśika sacet kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:862: avirahitaś ca sarvajñatācittena bhaviṣyati tasya kaścid evābhaiṣajyam avakiret,
S06psp_2-3u:863: kākhordaṃ vā kuryād agnikhadāṃ vopanāmayec chastreṇa vā hanyād viṣaṃ vā dadyād udake vainac chorayet sarvāṇy etāni tasya na krāmanti. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_2-3u:864: mahāvidyaiṣā kauśika yad uta prajñāpāramitā, anuttaraiṣā (PSP_2-3:55)
S06psp_2-3u:865: kauśika vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā. atra hi kauśika śikṣamāṇaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā nātmavyābādhāya cetayate,
S06psp_2-3u:870_0: tathā hi naivātmānam upalabhate. na parān nobhayam upalabhate. na rūpam upalabhate.
S06psp_2-3u:870_1: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānam upalabhate. na yāvad vyastasamastān
S06psp_2-3u:870_3: buddhadharmān yāvat sarvākārajñatām api nopalabhate. anupalabhamāno nātmavyābādhāya cetayate,
S06psp_2-3u:872: nobhayavyābādhāya cetayate. anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ pratilabhate sarvasattvāṃś cāvalokayati. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_2-3u:873_0: atra hi vidyāyāṃ śikṣamāṇair atītais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā
S06psp_2-3u:873_1: samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā. ye 'pi te bhaviṣyanti tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās
S06psp_2-3u:873_2: te 'py atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante.
S06psp_2-3u:873_3: ye 'pi te daśadiglokadhātuṣv etarhi pratyutpannās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās
S06psp_2-3u:873_4: te 'py atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
S06psp_2-3u:874: punar aparaṃ kauśika yatremāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:875: na tatra maṇuṣyo vā amanuṣyo vā avatāraprekṣī avatāragaveṣī avatāraṃ lapsyate. tat kasya hetos?
S06psp_2-3u:876_0: tathā hy atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pūjārthāya trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā
S06psp_2-3u:876_1: devaputrās trayastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikā
S06psp_2-3u:877_0: ye 'py anyeṣv aprameyeṣv asaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrā yāvad
S06psp_2-3u:877_1: akaniṣṭhā devāputrās te 'pi teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ
S06psp_2-3u:878_0: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti te ca devaputrā agatyemāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:878_1: prajñāpāramitāṃ satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti mānayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti pūjayitvā
S06psp_2-3u:878_2: pratigamiṣyanti. ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati tasyeme
S06psp_2-3u:878_3: dṛṣṭadhārmikā guṇānuśaṃsā bhaviṣyanti. tadyathāpi nāma kauśika ye kecid bodhimaṇḍagatā
S06psp_2-3u:878_4: vā bodhimaṇḍaparisāmantagatā vā bodhimaṇḍābhyantaragatā vā tiryagyonigatān apy upādāya
S06psp_2-3u:878_5: na te śakyante manuṣyeṇa vā amanuṣyeṇa vā viheṭhayituṃ vā vihiṃsayituṃ vā. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_2-3u:879_0: atra hi niṣadya taiḥ paurvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā
S06psp_2-3u:879_1: samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā. anāgatair api pratyutpannair api tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ
S06psp_2-3u:879_2: samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbhotsyate abhisaṃbudhyate ca. abhisaṃbudhya
S06psp_2-3u:879_5: sattvān divyamānuṣyakāyaṃ saṃpattau pratiṣṭhāpayanti. srotaāpattiphale sakṛdāgāmiphale
S06psp_2-3u:879_6: 'nāgāmiphale 'rhattve pratyekabuddhatve 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayanti. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_2-3u:880_0: anayaiva kauśika prajñāpāramitayā sapṛthivīpradeśaś caityabhūtaḥ kṛtaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:882: evam ukte śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:883_0: yo hi kaścid bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatām
S06psp_2-3u:883_2: samantāc ca dīpamālābhir bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:884_0: yaś ca tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛtasya śarīrāṇi stūpeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyati
S06psp_2-3u:884_1: pratiṣṭhāpya pratigṛhṇīyād dhārayed vācayet tāni ca satkuryād gurukuryād (PSP_2-3:57)
S06psp_2-3u:887: evam ukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat: tena hi kauśika tvām evātra pratiprakṣyāmi,
S06psp_2-3u:888: yathā te kṣamate tathā vyākuryāḥ. tat kiṃ manyase?

S06psp_2-3u:1099: na ca punas tān vigrahacittotpādān utpādayiṣyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:1100: yeṣāṃ ca devaputrāṇāṃ devakanyānāṃ vā cyutikālo bhavet teṣām api purataḥ svādhyāyaṃ kuryās,

S06psp_2-3u:1102: tatraiva devabhavane te utpatsyante evaṃ maharddhikā hy asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ śravā yasya kasyacit kauśika kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā (PSP_2-3:70)
S06psp_2-3u:1103: vā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā śrotrāvabhāsam āgamiṣyati. sarve te tena kuśalamūlenānupūrveṇānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante.
S06psp_2-3u:1104: evam ukte śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:1105: evam etad bhagavann evam etat sugata tathā hi bhagavan ye 'tīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā abhūvan,
S06psp_2-3u:1106_0: yeṣāṃ śrāvakā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau pratiṣṭhitās te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitām
S06psp_2-3u:1106_1: āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāḥ. ye 'pi te bhagavan bhaviṣyanti anāgate
S06psp_2-3u:1106_2: 'dhvani buddhā bhagavantaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghās te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamyānuttarāṃ

S06psp_2-3u:1106_4: tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bhagavantaḥ sa śrāvakasaṃghās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante

S06psp_2-3u:1108: tathā hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarve buddhadharmā antargatāḥ sarve bodhisattvadharmāḥ sarve pratyekabuddhadharmāḥ sarve śrāvakadharmā antargatāḥ
S06psp_2-3u:1109: evam ukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat: evam etat kauśikaivam etat,
S06psp_2-3u:1111: anuttareyaṃ kauśika vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_2-3u:1112: asamasameyaṃ kauśika vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_2-3u:1114_0: tathā hi kauśika ye 'tītānāgatapratyutpannā daśadiśi loke tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ
S06psp_2-3u:1114_1: sarve te imām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyante
S06psp_2-3u:1114_2: abhisaṃbhotsyante ca. imām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamya daśakuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ prajñāyante,

S06psp_2-3u:1115_4: ṣaḍ abhijñā dharmadhātur bhūtakoṭitathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā dharmatā dharmasthititā

S06psp_2-3u:1116_1: daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā loke prabhāvyante. saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyā dharmā āryasatyāny
