S06psp_2-3u:1116_4: tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā
S06psp_2-3u:1116_5: mārgākārajñatā sarvajñatā sarvākārajñatā loke prajñāyate. dharmadhātur bhūtakoṭitathatā
S06psp_2-3u:1116_6: avitathatā ananyatathatā dharmatā dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā loke prajñāyate.
S06psp_2-3u:1116_7: pañca cakṣūṃṣi srotaāpattiphalaṃ srotaāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmī anāgāmiphalam
S06psp_2-3u:1117_0: anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ. tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke prabhāvyate. tadyathāpi
S06psp_2-3u:1117_1: nāma kauśika candramaṇḍalam āgamya sarvauṣadhītārāgaṇāḥ prabhāvyante. evam eva kauśika
S06psp_2-3u:1117_2: bodhisattvacandramaṇḍalam āgamya daśakuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ. sarvakuśalacaryā samyakcaryā
S06psp_2-3u:1118_3: prajñāyante. sarvajñatā prabhāvyate. tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ prabhāvyante.
S06psp_2-3u:1118_4: yadāpi buddhā bhagavanto loke nābhisaṃbudhyante notpādas tathāgatānāṃ bhavati,
S06psp_2-3u:1119: tadāpi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ. sattvānāṃ laukikāṃś ca lokottarāṃś ca dharmān deśayanti.
S06psp_2-3u:1123_0: yenopāyakauśalyena ṣaḍ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati sarvaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayati sarvasamādhīṃś
S06psp_2-3u:1123_1: ca samāpadyate sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni ca pratilabhate apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīś
S06psp_2-3u:1123_2: ca samāpadyate saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān bhāvayati āryasatyāni bhāvayati aṣṭa
S06psp_2-3u:1123_3: vimokṣān bhāvayati navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīś ca samāpadyate abhijñā bhāvayati triṇi
S06psp_2-3u:1124_0: bhāvayati daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān
S06psp_2-3u:1124_2: na ca śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā sākṣāt karoti. sattvāṃś ca paripācayati
S06psp_2-3u:1124_3: buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati bodhisattvasaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇāti sarvajñatāṃ cānuprāpnoti.
S06psp_2-3u:1125_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati
S06psp_2-3u:1125_1: dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati sa ebhiḥ dṛṣṭadhārmikair
S06psp_2-3u:1126: evam ukte śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:1127_0: katamair bhagavan dṛṣṭadhārmikair guṇaiḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā samanvāgatā
S06psp_2-3u:1127_1: bhaviṣyanti ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti
S06psp_2-3u:1129_0: tena hi kauśika kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na viṣeṇa kālaṃ kariṣyanti nāgninā na
S06psp_2-3u:1129_1: śastreṇa nodakena kālaṃ kariṣyanti yāvan na kenacid vyādhinā kālaṃ kariṣyanti sthāpayitvā
S06psp_2-3u:1129_2: pūrvakarmavipākaṃ na ca rājakulād upadravā bhaviṣyanti. sacet kulaputro vā kuladuhitā
S06psp_2-3u:1129_3: vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyan rājakulaṃ praviśaty asyāvatāraprekṣiṇo 'vatāragaveṣiṇo
S06psp_2-3u:1131: tathā hy asyā eva prajñāpāramitāyās tejasā. sacet kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyaṃs tatra rājakulam upasaṃkramiṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:1132: te cāsya tatra rājāno vā rājaputrā vā rājamahāmātrā vā pūrvam ālapitavyaṃ maṃsyante abhibhāṣitavyaṃ maṃsyante.
S06psp_2-3u:1134_0: tathā hi teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca sarvasattvānām antike maitracittaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1134_1: karuṇācittaṃ muditācittam upekṣācittaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati. ebhiḥ sa kauśika
S06psp_2-3u:1134_2: dṛṣṭadhārmikair guṇaiḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā samanvāgato bhaviṣyati. ya imāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1134_3: prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:1135: punar aparaṃ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ebhiḥ sāṃparāyikair (PSP_2-3:73)
S06psp_2-3u:1136_0: guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bhaviṣyati. ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati
S06psp_2-3u:1136_1: vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati. yad uta na jātu daśabhiḥ kuśalaiḥ
S06psp_2-3u:1137_0: na caturbhir dhyānair na caturbhir apramāṇair na catasṛbhir ārūpyasamāpattibhir na
S06psp_2-3u:1137_1: pāramitābhir na saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyair dharmair na satyair nāṣṭavimokṣair na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattibhir
S06psp_2-3u:1137_2: na tribhir vimokṣamukhair nābhijñābhir na sarvaśūnyatābhir na sarvasamādhibhir na
S06psp_2-3u:1137_3: sarvadhāraṇīmukhair na daśabhir balair na vaiśāradyair na pratisaṃvidbhir nāṣṭādaśabhir
S06psp_2-3u:1137_4: āveṇikair buddhadharmair virahito bhaviṣyati. na lakṣaṇānuvyañjanair virahito bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:1137_5: sa na jātu nirayatiryagyoniyamalokeṣūpapatsyate. na jātv indriyavikalo bhaviṣyati
S06psp_2-3u:1137_6: na jātv aṅgahīno bhaviṣyati na jātu daridrakuleṣūpapatsyate na veṇukārakuleṣūpapatsyate
S06psp_2-3u:1137_7: na puṣkasakuleṣūpapatsyate na mauṣṭikakuleṣūpapatsyate na caṇḍālaurabhrikaśākunikakuleṣūpapatsyate
S06psp_2-3u:1137_8: na śūdrakuleṣūpapatsyate kṣatriyamahāśālakuleṣu vā brāhmaṇamahāśālakuleṣu vā gṛhapatimahāśālakuleṣu
S06psp_2-3u:1137_9: vā udārodāreṣūpapatsyate. sa tataḥ prabhṛti satatasamitaṃ dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇānuvyañjanasamalaṃkṛtakāyo
S06psp_2-3u:1137_10: bhaviṣyati yatra vā lokadhātau buddhā bhagavanto bhaviṣyanti tatra buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1137_11: purataḥ padma aupapāduka upapatsyate. na jātv abhijñā virahito bhaviṣyati. sa ākāṅkṣaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1138: tān buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsituṃ dharmaṃ ca śrotuṃ buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāman sattvāṃś ca paripācayati,
S06psp_2-3u:1140_0: tasmāt tarhi kauśika kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prajñāpāramitā udgṛhītavyā dhārayitavyā
S06psp_2-3u:1140_1: vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā yoniśaś ca manasikartavyā sarvajñatācittena cāvirahitena
S06psp_2-3u:1140_2: bhavitavyaṃ. sa etair dṛṣṭadhārmikair guṇaiḥ sāṃparāyikair guṇair avirahito bhaviṣyati
S06psp_2-3u:1141: atha khalv anyatīrthikānāṃ parivrājakānāṃ śatam upārambhābhiprāyāṇāṃ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmati sma.
S06psp_2-3u:1142: atha khalu śakrasya devānām indrasyaitad abhavat:
S06psp_2-3u:1143: idam anyatīrthikānāṃ parivrājakānāṃ śatam upārambhābhiprāyāṇāṃ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmati,
S06psp_2-3u:1144: yan nūnam ahaṃ yāvanmātraṃ mayā bhagavato 'ntikāt prajñāpāramitāyā udgrahītaṃ tāvanmātraṃ svādhyāyeyaṃ yad etad anyatīrthikānāṃ (PSP_2-3:74)
S06psp_2-3u:1145: parivrājakānāṃ śataṃ na bhagavantam upasaṃkrāmeyur nāntarāyaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ kuryuḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:1146: atha khalu śakro devānām indro yāvad anena bhagavato 'ntikāt prajñāpāramitāyā udgrahītaṃ tāvat svādhyāyati sma.
S06psp_2-3u:1147: atha khalu te 'nyatīrthikāḥ parivrājakā dūrata eva bhagavantaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya yenaiva mārgeṇāgatās tenaiva pratigatāḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:1149: kim atra kāraṇaṃ yenaite 'nyatīrthikāḥ parivrājakā upārambhābhiprāyā bhagavantaṃ dūrata eva pradakṣiṇīkṛtya yenaiva mārgeṇāgatās tenaiva pratigatāḥ?
S06psp_2-3u:1150: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāyāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram āmantrayate sma:
S06psp_2-3u:1151_0: śakreṇa śāriputra devānām indreṇa iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā samanvāhṛtā yenaite 'nyatīrthikāḥ
S06psp_2-3u:1151_1: parivrājakā dūrata eva bhagavantaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya yenaiva mārgeṇāgatās tenaiva pratigatāḥ
S06psp_2-3u:1151_2: na hi śāriputra teṣām anyatīrthikānāṃ parivrājakānām ekasyāpi śuklaṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_2-3u:1152: sarva ete 'nyatīrthikāḥ parivrājakāḥ pratihatacittā upārambhābhiprāyā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante,
S06psp_2-3u:1153: nāhaṃ taṃ śāriputra samanupaśyāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyām imāṃ prajñāpāramitām upārambhābhiprāyaḥ pratihatacitta upasaṃkrāmen,
S06psp_2-3u:1156_0: tathā hi śāriputra ya iha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājikās trāyastriṃśā
S06psp_2-3u:1156_1: yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikā brahmapurohitā brahmapārṣadyā
S06psp_2-3u:1156_2: yāvad akaniṣṭhā devaputrā ye 'pi śrāvakā ye 'pi pratyekabuddhā ye 'pi bodhisattvā
S06psp_2-3u:1156_3: mahāsattvās tair apīyaṃ prajñāpāramitā parigṛhītā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_2-3u:1158_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra ye 'pi te pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu
S06psp_2-3u:1158_1: yāvad daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣv ekaikasyāṃ diśi buddhā bhagavantaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:1158_3: api sarvair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā parigṛhītā. tat kasya hetos?
S06psp_2-3u:1160: atha khalu mārasya pāpīyasa etad abhavad:
S06psp_2-3u:1161_0: imās tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya catasraḥ pariṣadaḥ saṃmukhaṃ sthitāḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:1161_1: amī ca kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrāḥ saṃmukhaṃ sthitā niḥsaṃśayam atra bodhisattvā (PSP_2-3:75)
S06psp_2-3u:1163: yan nūnam ahaṃ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmeyaṃ vicakṣuḥkaraṇāyeti.
S06psp_2-3u:1164: atha khalu māraḥ pāpīyāṃś caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ nirmāya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkramitukāmo bhavet.
S06psp_2-3u:1165: atha khalu śakrasya devānām indrasyaitad abhavat:
S06psp_2-3u:1166_0: māro batāyaṃ pāpīyāṃś caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ nirmāya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkramitukāmaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:1166_1: yo 'yaṃ mārasya pāpīyasaś caturaṅgasya balakāyasyaivaṃrūpo vyūhaḥ. na rājño bimbisārasya
S06psp_2-3u:1171: yo 'yaṃ caturaṅgasya balakāyasyaivaṃrūpo māreṇa pāpīyasā nirmitaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:1172: dīrgharātraṃ khalu punar māraḥ pāpīyān bhagavato 'vatāraprekṣī avatāragaveṣī sattvānāṃ ca viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:1173: yan nūnam aham imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ samanvāhareyaṃ smṛtyā svādhyāyaṃ kuryām.
S06psp_2-3u:1174: atha khalu śakro devānām indraḥ prajñāparamitāṃ samanvājahāra smṛtyā svādhyāyam akarot,
S06psp_2-3u:1175: yathā yathā śakro devānām indraḥ smṛtyā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyati sma tathā tathā māraḥ pāpīyāṃs tenaiva mārgeṇa tenaiva dvāreṇa punar eva pratyudāvṛtto 'bhūt.
S06psp_2-3u:1176: atha khalu ye 'syāṃ pariṣadi cāturmahārājakāyikā devā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devās te divyāni puṣpāṇy abhinirmāyāntarīkṣagatā eva yena bhagavāṃs tenākṣipanti sma tenābhyavakiranti sma.
S06psp_2-3u:1178_0: ciraṃ bateyaṃ prajñāpāramitā jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ pracaratu yāvad iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā
S06psp_2-3u:1178_1: jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyānāṃ pracariṣyati tāvan na tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntardhānaṃ bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:1180: saṃghasya loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati. evaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau,
S06psp_2-3u:1181: evaṃ daśasu dikṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu bodhisattvānāṃ caryāviśeṣaḥ prajñāsyate,
S06psp_2-3u:1182: yatra ca digbhāge imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā likhitāṃ dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti pustakalikhitām api kṛtvā sthāpayiṣyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:1184: bhaviṣyati, sanāthā vigatatamondhakārā ca eṣā dig bhaviṣyati, yatreyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pracariṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:1185: evam ukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat: evam etat kauśikaivam etat,
S06psp_2-3u:1186: yatra yatra diśi lokadhātuprasare iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pracariṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:1187: pustakalikhitā ālokajātā ca eṣā dig bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:1188: sanāthā vigatatamondhakārā ca eṣā dig bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:1189: atha khalu te devaputrā divyāni kusumāny abhinirmāya yena bhagavāṃs tenābhyavakiranti sma.
S06psp_2-3u:1191_0: yaḥ kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati
S06psp_2-3u:1191_1: vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati na tasya mārā vā mārakāyikā
S06psp_2-3u:1191_2: vā devaputrā avatāraṃ lapsyante. vayam api bhagavaṃ tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur
S06psp_2-3u:1192: śāstāram iti bhagavaṃs taṃ vayaṃ kulaputraṃ vā kuladuhitaraṃ vā maṃsyāmahe ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:1193: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:1194: na te bhagavan kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vāvarakeṇa kuśalamūlena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:1195_0: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś
S06psp_2-3u:1195_1: ca manasikariṣyanti. pūrvajinakṛtādhikārās te bhagavan kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro
S06psp_2-3u:1195_2: vā bhaviṣyanti ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti
S06psp_2-3u:1195_3: yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti. bahubuddhaparyupāsitāḥ kalyāṇamitraparigṛhītās te kulaputrāḥ
S06psp_2-3u:1197: ato nirjātā hi sarvajñatā yad uta prajñāpāramitā nirjātā sarvajñatā nirjātā ca prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_2-3u:1199: tathā hi nānyā prajñāpāramitā nānyā sarvajñatā iti hi sarvajñatā ca prajñāpāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06psp_2-3u:1200: evam ukte bhagavān sakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat: evam etat (PSP_2-3:77)
S06psp_2-3u:1202: yathā vadasi sarvajñatā ca prajñāpāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. iti svaparārthādhimuktir mṛdumadhyā
S06psp_2-3u:1203: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:1204_0: tathā hi bhagavān na dānapāramitāyā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati na śīlapāramitāyā na
S06psp_2-3u:1204_1: kṣāntipāramitāyā na vīryapāramitāyā na dhyānapāramitāyā yathā prajñāpāramitāyā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati,
S06psp_2-3u:1207: nāṣṭānāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati,
S06psp_2-3u:1208: na ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ na sarvāṇāṃ śūnyatānāṃ na samādhīnāṃ na sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati,
S06psp_2-3u:1209: na daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ na vaiśāradyānāṃ na pratisaṃvidāṃ nāṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati yathā prajñāpāramitāyā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati.
S06psp_2-3u:1210: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:1211: prajñāpāramitā ānanda pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā yad uta ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇām āryasatyānām apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā,
S06psp_2-3u:1212: aṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ navānām anupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā,
S06psp_2-3u:1214: daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā,
S06psp_2-3u:1216: tat kiṃ manyase? ānanda apariṇāmitaṃ dānaṃ sarvajñatāyāṃ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate.
S06psp_2-3u:1218: apariṇāmitaṃ śīlaṃ apariṇāmitā kṣāntir apariṇāmitaṃ vīryam apariṇāmitaṃ dhyānam apariṇāmitā prajñā sarvajñatāyāṃ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate.
S06psp_2-3u:1219: ānanda āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan no hīdaṃ sugata,
S06psp_2-3u:1220: kathaṃ punar bhagavan dānaṃ sarvajñatāpariṇāmitaṃ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate?
S06psp_2-3u:1222: kathaṃ punar bhagavan śīlaṃ kṣāntir vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñā sarvajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmitā pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate?
S06psp_2-3u:1224_0: advayayogenānanda dānaṃ pariṇāmitaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntir vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñā sarvajñatāyāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1224_2: dānaṃ yāvat prajñā sarvajñatāyāṃ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate.
S06psp_2-3u:1226: kathaṃ bhagavann advayayogena dānaṃ pariṇāmitaṃ sarvajñatāyāṃ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate?
S06psp_2-3u:1227: evaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntir vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ kathaṃ bhagavan prajñādvayayogena pariṇāmitā sarvajñatāyāṃ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate?
S06psp_2-3u:1229: rūpasyānanda advayayogena vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyādvayayogena yāvad bodheḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:1235: tathā hi ānanda rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ vedanā vedanayā śūnyā saṃjñā saṃjñayā śūnyā saṃskārāḥ saṃskāraiḥ śūnyā vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyam.
S06psp_2-3u:1237: tathā hi rūpaṃ ca vedanā ca saṃjñā ca saṃskārā ca vijñānaṃ ca pāramitāś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ yāvad bodhiś ca pāramitāś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:1238_0: tasmāt tarhy ānanda prajñāpāramitā nu pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā sarvapāramitānāṃ sarvaśūnyatānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1238_2: āryasatyānām aṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ navānām anupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1238_3: ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām
S06psp_2-3u:1238_4: āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ yāvad bodheḥ sarvajñatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā.
S06psp_2-3u:1238_5: tadyathāpi nāmānanda mahāpṛthivīṃ niśrāya sāmagrīvaśena bījāni virohanti. evam evānanda
S06psp_2-3u:1238_6: prajñāpāramitāṃ niśrāya prajñāpāramitām āgamya sarvāḥ. pāramitāḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:1239: apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattaya āryasatyāni ṣaḍabhijñāḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni virohanti. daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikā buddhadharmā virohanti yāvat sarvajñatā (PSP_2-3:79)
S06psp_2-3u:1240_0: virohati. sarvajñatāṃ pariniśrāya sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni
S06psp_2-3u:1240_2: yāvad āveṇikā buddhadharmā virohanti. tasmād ānanda prajñāpāramitaivāsāṃ pāramitānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1240_3: pariṇāyikā yāvād aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:1242_0: na khalu punar bhagavaṃs tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena prajñāpāramitāyāḥ sarvagūṇāḥ
S06psp_2-3u:1242_1: parikīrtitāḥ yān guṇān sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā parigṛhṇāti imāṃ prajñāpāramitām
S06psp_2-3u:1242_2: udgṛhṇan dhārayan vācayan paryavāpnuvan yoniśaś ca manasikurvan prajñāpāramitayā
S06psp_2-3u:1242_3: bhagavann udgrahītayā dhāritayā vācitayā paryavāptayā yoniśaś ca manasikṛtayā daśānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1242_4: kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati. caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ caturṇām apramāṇānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1242_5: catasṛṇām ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇām āryasatyānām
S06psp_2-3u:1242_6: aṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ trayānaṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1242_7: sarvapāramitānāṃ sarvaśūnyatānāṃ sarvasamādhīnāṃ sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1242_8: caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1242_9: loke prādurbhāvo bhavati. prajñāpāramitayā bhagavann udgrahītayā dhāritayā vācitayā
S06psp_2-3u:1242_10: paryavāptayā yoniśaś ca manasikṛtayā gṛhapatimahāśālakulāni prajñāyante,
S06psp_2-3u:1245: cāturmahārājakāyikā devā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06psp_2-3u:1246: prajñāpāramitayā bhagavann udgrahītayā yāvad yoniśo manasikṛtayā srotaāpannāḥ prajñāyante,
S06psp_2-3u:1249: prajñāpāramitayā bhagavann udgrahītayā dhāritayā vācitayā paryavāptayā yoniśaś ca manasikṛtayā tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke prajñāyante.
S06psp_2-3u:1251: evam ukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:1252: na punaḥ kauśika yaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā dhāritā vācitā paryavāptā yoniśaś ca manasikṛtā teṣām etāvata evaṃ guṇān vadāmi.
S06psp_2-3u:1254_0: apramāṇena hi kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā śīlaskandhena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti
S06psp_2-3u:1254_1: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś
S06psp_2-3u:1254_2: ca manasikariṣyanti sarvajñatācittena cāvirahitā bhaviṣyanti. apramāṇena samādhiskandhena
S06psp_2-3u:1254_4: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś
S06psp_2-3u:1254_5: ca manasikariṣyanti sarvajñatācittena cāvirahitā bhaviṣyanti. tathāgatapratimās te
S06psp_2-3u:1254_6: kauśika kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā veditavyā ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīyanti
S06psp_2-3u:1254_7: dhārayiyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti sarvajñatācittena
S06psp_2-3u:1254_8: cāvirahitā bhaviṣyanti. yaś ca kauśika sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ śīlaskandhaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:1255_0: yaś ca prajñāpāramitāvihāriṇāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca śīlaskandhaḥ samādhiskandhaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:1255_1: prajñāskandho vimuktiskandho vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaḥ asya kauśika śīlaskandhasya
S06psp_2-3u:1256: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
S06psp_2-3u:1257: saṃkhyām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy upaniśām apy upaniṣadam api nopaiti.
S06psp_2-3u:1259: tathā hi teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmeś cittaṃ vimuktaṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:1260_0: na ca kaścid dharmo nāvigato na jñātaḥ. ye kauśika kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1261: kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca ime dṛṣṭadhārmikāḥ sāṃparāyikāś ca guṇānuśaṃsāḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyāḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:1263: evam ukte śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:1264_0: ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā satatasamitaṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1264_1: saṃvidhāsyāmi ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati
S06psp_2-3u:1265_0: avirahitaś ca bhaviṣyati sarvajñatācittena imāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāṃ satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati
S06psp_2-3u:1266: evam ukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:1267_0: teṣāṃ punaḥ kauśika kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1267_1: bahūni devaputraśatasahasrāṇi dharmaśravaṇāyopasaṃkramiṣyanti. teṣāṃ khalu punaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:1267_2: kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ pratibhānaṃ te devaputrā
S06psp_2-3u:1267_3: upasaṃhartavyaṃ maṃsyante. yadāpi te dharma bhāṇakā na mantrayitukāmā bhaviṣyanti
S06psp_2-3u:1267_4: tadāpi tenaiva devaputrā dharmagauraveṇa pratibhānam upasaṃhartavyaṃ maṃsyante. imam
S06psp_2-3u:1267_5: api kauśika kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā dṛṣṭadhārmikaguṇaṃ pratilapsyante ya imāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1267_6: prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti
S06psp_2-3u:1267_7: tāṃ ca likhitvā satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti mānayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:1268_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1268_1: catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ purato nāvalīnacittatā bhaviṣyati ko vā mamānuyokṣyate upālapsyate ceti.
S06psp_2-3u:1270: tathā hi teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā iyam eva prajñāpāramitā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ kariṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:1271_0: tathā hy atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarvadharmā abhinnā laukikāś ca lokottarāś ca sādhāraṇāś
S06psp_2-3u:1271_1: ca kuśalāś ca saṃskṛtāś cāsaṃskṛtāś ca śrāvakadharmāś ca pratyekabuddhadharmāś ca
S06psp_2-3u:1272: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ (PSP_2-3:82)
S06psp_2-3u:1273: sthitvā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ sthitās te upālambhaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na samanupaśyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:1274: yo 'py upālabhyeta tam api na samanupaśyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:1275: evaṃ hi teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītānām upālambho na bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:1276_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇato
S06psp_2-3u:1276_1: dhārayato vācayataḥ paryavāpnuvato yoniśaś ca manasikurvataś cittaṃ nāvalīyate na
S06psp_2-3u:1276_2: saṃlīyate nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate.
S06psp_2-3u:1278_0: tathā hi sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā vastu na samanupaśyati ya ālīyeta vā saṃlīyeta
S06psp_2-3u:1278_1: vā uttrasyed vā saṃtrasyed vā saṃtrāsam āpadyate vā. imān api sa kauśika kulaputro
S06psp_2-3u:1278_2: vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikān guṇān pratigrahīṣyati ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati
S06psp_2-3u:1278_3: dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati satkariṣyati mānayiṣyati
S06psp_2-3u:1279_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika yo hi kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām
S06psp_2-3u:1279_1: udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati tāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1279_2: ca likhitvā satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ
S06psp_2-3u:1279_3: sa priyo bhaviṣyati mātāpitṛṇāṃ mitrāmātyajñātisālohitānāṃ śramaṇabrāhmaṇānāṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:1280_0: ye 'pi te daśadiśi loke sarvalokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvāś ca pratyekabuddhāś
S06psp_2-3u:1280_1: cārhantaś ca sarve śaikṣāḥ sarve cāśaikṣās teṣām api sa bodhisattvaḥ priyo bhaviṣyati
S06psp_2-3u:1280_2: sa devakasyāpi lokasya sa mārakasya sa śramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ sa devamānuṣāsurāyāḥ
S06psp_2-3u:1280_3: prajāyāḥ priyo bhaviṣyati manaāpaḥ. iti svaparārthārdhimuktimadhyādhimātrā
S06psp_2-3u:1281: anācchedena ca pratibhānena samanvāgato bhaviṣyati. anācchedyayā dānapāramitayā samanvāgato bhaviṣyati. evam anācchedyayā śīlapāramitayā (PSP_2-3:83)
S06psp_2-3u:1282_0: anācchedyayā kṣāntipāramitayā anācchedyayā vīryapāramitayā anācchedyayā dhyānapāramitayā
S06psp_2-3u:1282_1: anācchedyayā prajñāpāramitayā samanvāgato bhaviṣyati. anācchedyayā adhyātmaśūnyatayā
S06psp_2-3u:1282_2: anācchedyayā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā samanvāgato bhaviṣyati. anācchedyaiḥ smṛtyupasthānaiḥ
S06psp_2-3u:1282_4: samanvāgato bhaviṣyati. anācchedyair āryasatyair anācchedyābhir apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattibhiḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:1283_1: anācchedyair daśabhis tathāgatabalaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir
S06psp_2-3u:1283_2: aṣṭādaśabhiś cāveṇikair buddhadharmair anācchedyena sattvaparipākena anācchedyayā
S06psp_2-3u:1283_3: buddhakṣetrapariśuddhyā anācchedyayā sarvākārajñatayā samanvāgato bhaviṣyati. pratibalaś ca bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:1284_0: utpannotpannānāṃ tīrthyavādānāṃ sahadharmeṇaiva nigrahaṃ kariṣyati. imam api kauśika
S06psp_2-3u:1284_1: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ sāṃparāyikaṃ ca guṇaṃ parigṛhṇīyād ya imāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1284_2: prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:1284_3: avirahitaś ca bhaviṣyati sa sarvākārajñātācittena tāṃ ca likhitvā satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati
S06psp_2-3u:1286_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitām
S06psp_2-3u:1286_1: api kṛtvā dhārāyiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati tatra kauśika ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre
S06psp_2-3u:1286_2: lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitās
S06psp_2-3u:1286_3: te tatrāgatyaināṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti
S06psp_2-3u:1286_4: manasikariṣyanti vandiṣyanti namaskṛtvā vanditvā ca punar eva prakramiṣyanti. evaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1286_5: trāyastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino brahmapāriṣadyā brahmapurohitā
S06psp_2-3u:1286_6: mahābrahmāṇaḥ parīttābhā apramāṇābhā ābhāsvarāḥ parīttaśubhā apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnā
S06psp_2-3u:1286_7: anabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavā brhatphalāḥ śuddhāvāsā avṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhāḥ
S06psp_2-3u:1286_8: tatra ye kauśika mahābrahmāṇo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau kṛtapraṇidhānās te 'pi
S06psp_2-3u:1286_9: tatrāgatyemāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahya paryavāpya dhārayitvā vācayitvā namaskṛtya
S06psp_2-3u:1287_0: prakramiṣyanti. ye 'pi śuddhāvāsakāyikā avṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhā
S06psp_2-3u:1287_1: devaputrās te 'pi tatrāgatyemāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahya paryavāpya dhārayitvā vācayitvā
S06psp_2-3u:1287_2: namaskṛtya punar eva prakramiṣyanti. tena hi kauśika kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā
S06psp_2-3u:1288_0: ye te daśadiglokadhātuṣu devaputrāś cāturmahārājakāyikā yāvad bṛhatphalā ye 'nuttarāyāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1288_1: samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprashitā ye 'pi śuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrā ye 'pi cānye devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās
S06psp_2-3u:1288_2: te 'pīhāgatyemāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahya paryavāpya dhārayitvā vācayitvā pūjayitvā punar gacchantu,
S06psp_2-3u:1289_0: teṣām etad dharmadānaṃ dattaṃ bhavantu. ye 'pi daśadiglokadhātuṣu cāturmahārājakāyikā
S06psp_2-3u:1289_1: devaputrā yāvad bṛhatphalā devaputrā ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitā
S06psp_2-3u:1289_2: ye 'pi śuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrās te 'pi tatrāgatyemāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti
S06psp_2-3u:1289_3: dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti vanditvā namaskṛtya pūjayitvā punar eva
S06psp_2-3u:1289_4: prakramitavyaṃ maṃsyante. tasya khalu punaḥ kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā ya iha
S06psp_2-3u:1289_5: trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā devā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devā ye
S06psp_2-3u:1289_6: 'pi te daśadiglokadhātuṣu cāturmahārājakāyikā devā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devās te 'pi tasya
S06psp_2-3u:1289_7: kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyanti. nāpy asya kaścid
S06psp_2-3u:1289_8: avatāraprekṣī avatāragaveṣī avatāraṃ lapsyate sthāpayitvā pūrvakarmavipākaṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:1290: imān api kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikān guṇān parigṛhṇāti.
S06psp_2-3u:1292_0: tathā hi ye devaputrā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitās te 'pi tatrāgantavyaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1292_1: maṃsyante. tathā hi kauśika devaputrā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau sarvasattvānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1292_2: traṇāya hitasukhāya saṃprasthitāḥ. iti svaparārthādhimuktir adhimātramadhyā
S06psp_2-3u:1293: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:1294: kathaṃ bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā jñāsyati,
S06psp_2-3u:1295: iha cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrā āgacchanti yāvad akaniṣṭhā devaputrā āgacchantīti?
S06psp_2-3u:1296: evaṃ samantād daśabhyo digbhya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahītuṃ vā dhārayituṃ vā vācayituṃ vā paryavāptuṃ vā satkartuṃ vā gurukartuṃ vā mānayituṃ vā pūjayituṃ vā.
S06psp_2-3u:1297: evam ukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat: sacet kauśika (PSP_2-3:85)
S06psp_2-3u:1298_0: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā udāram avabhāsaṃ jñāsyati niṣṭhā tena gantavyā mahaujaskā
S06psp_2-3u:1298_1: mahaujaskā devā āgātā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vācayitum udgrahītuṃ paryavāptuṃ dhārayituṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1298_2: satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayituṃ vandituṃ namaskartum.
S06psp_2-3u:1299_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika sacet kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā amānuṣaṃ divyaṃ gandham anāghrātapūrvam
S06psp_2-3u:1299_1: āghrāsyati niṣṭhā tena gantavyā mahaujaskā mahaujaskā iha devaputrā āgatā iti prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1299_2: vācayituṃ śrotum udgrahītuṃ paryavāptuṃ dhārayituṃ satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayitum.
S06psp_2-3u:1300: punar aparaṃ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā caukṣasamudācāro bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:1301_0: tasya tayā caukṣasamudācāratayā devatā āgatyemāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhya dhārayitvā
S06psp_2-3u:1301_1: vācayitvā satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvā āttamanaskā bhaviṣyanti. yāś ca
S06psp_2-3u:1301_2: tatra pṛthivīpradeśe 'lpaujaskā alpaujaskā devatā bhaviṣyanti tās tato 'pakramitavyaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1301_3: maṃsyante. teṣāṃ mahaujaskānāṃ mahaujaskānāṃ devānāṃ tejaś ca śriyaś cāsahamānāḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:1301_4: yathāyathā mahaujaskā mahaujaskā devatā upasaṃkramiṣyanti tathātathā te kulaputrāḥ
S06psp_2-3u:1301_5: kuladuhitaro vā udārādhimuktikā bhaviṣyanti. tasmiṃś ca pṛthivīpradeśe 'caukṣasamudācāratā na pracārayitavyā,
S06psp_2-3u:1303_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā kāyo na klānto bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:1303_1: kāyasukhaṃ bhaviṣyati. kāyalaghutāṃ ca bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya pratipanno
S06psp_2-3u:1303_2: bhaviṣyati. sa ca kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā kāyalaghutāṃ kāyakarmaṇyatāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1303_3: kāyasukhatāṃ cittalaghutāṃ cittakarmaṇyatāṃ cittasukhatāṃ ca jñāsyati. sukhena sa
S06psp_2-3u:1303_4: rātrau śayyāṃ kalpayiṣyati. imāṃ eva prajñāpāramitām āśayena kalpayan na pāpakān svapnān drakṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:1304_0: drakṣyaṃś ca punaḥ svapnena tathāgatān evārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān drakṣyati dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇacitritagātrān
S06psp_2-3u:1305_1: yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmapratisaṃyuktām eva kathāṃ śroṣyati. tāsāṃ ca pāramitānām
S06psp_2-3u:1305_2: arthaṃ śroṣyati yāvad aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānām arthaṃ śroṣyati. bodhivṛkṣaṃ drakṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:1305_3: bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ bodhimaṇḍam upasaṃkramamāṇaṃ drakṣyati. anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06psp_2-3u:1305_5: bahūni bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi drakṣyati dharmasaṃgītiratāni evaṃ sarvajñatā
S06psp_2-3u:1305_6: parigrahītavyā evaṃ sattvāḥ paripācayitavyā evaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayitavyam
S06psp_2-3u:1305_7: iti. bahunāṃ buddhakoṭīniyutaśataśahasrāṇāṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi śabdaṃ śroṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:1306_0: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām ūrdhvam adho vidikṣu bahūnāṃ buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1306_1: śabdaṃ śroṣyati. amuṣmin lokadhātau amuko nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ iyadbhir
S06psp_2-3u:1306_3: dharmaṃ deśayati. pūrvasyāṃ diśi bahūni buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi drakṣyati parinirvāyamāṇāni
S06psp_2-3u:1306_4: yāvad daśasu dikṣu bahūni buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi drakṣyati parinirvāyamāṇāni.
S06psp_2-3u:1306_5: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ stūpān dhātudharān nānāratnamayān bahūni stūpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi
S06psp_2-3u:1306_6: drakṣyati. tāṃś ca stūpān satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:1307_0: sa khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imān evaṃrūpān bhadrakāṃś ca svapnān
S06psp_2-3u:1307_1: drakṣyati. sa sukham eva svapsyati sukhaṃ ca pratibhotsyate ojaḥprakṣiptaṃ ca kāyaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1307_2: saṃjñāsyati. laghuṃ ca kāyaṃ saṃjñāsyati na guruṃ. na cāsya balavatī gṛddhir āhāre
S06psp_2-3u:1307_4: tadyathāpi nāma kauśika yogācārasya bhikṣoḥ samādher vyutthitasya manasikārasaṃtarpitena
S06psp_2-3u:1307_5: cittena na balavaty āhāre gṛddhir bhavati.
S06psp_2-3u:1308: evam eva kauśika tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā na balavaty āhāre gṛddhir bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:1309: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi tasyāmanuṣyā ojaḥ kāya upasaṃharanti. ye cāpi (PSP_2-3:87)
S06psp_2-3u:1310_1: ojaḥ kāye prakṣipanti. imaṃ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1310_2: guṇaṃ parigṛhṇīte ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇīte paryavāpnoti dhārayati vācayati
S06psp_2-3u:1310_3: yoniśaś ca manasikaroti avirahitaś ca sarvajñatācittena. iti svaparārthādhimuktir adhimātrādhimātrā
S06psp_2-3u:1311_0: kiṃ cāpi sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ nodgṛhṇīyān na dhārayen
S06psp_2-3u:1311_1: na vācayen na paryavāpnuyān na yoniśaś ca manasikuryān na parebhyaś ca saṃprakāśayed
S06psp_2-3u:1311_2: api tu khalu punaḥ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayet puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:1312_0: yaś ca kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇīyād dhārayed
S06psp_2-3u:1312_1: vācayet paryavāpnuyād yoniśaś ca manasikuryāt parebhyaś ca saṃprakāśayet tāṃ ca likhitāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1312_3: ayaṃ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tato nidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06psp_2-3u:1313_0: na tv eva yaḥ samantād daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān
S06psp_2-3u:1313_2: parinirvṛtānāṃ ca teṣāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1314: tāṃś ca satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayet puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:1315: iti parārthādhimuktir mṛdumṛddhi stūpasatkāraparivarto nāma tṛtīyaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:1316: atha khalu bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:1317: yady ayaṃ kauśika jambudvīpaḥ paripūrṇaś cūḍikābaddhas tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ bhavet,
S06psp_2-3u:1318: tāni te kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā upanāmayed,
S06psp_2-3u:1320: tatas tvaṃ tayor dvayor bhāgayoḥ sthāpitayoḥ kaṃ parigṛhṇīyāḥ?
S06psp_2-3u:1322: saced me bhagavann ayaṃ jambudvīpaḥ paripūrṇaś cūḍikābaddhas tathāgataśarīrāṇām upanāmyeta,
S06psp_2-3u:1323: iyaṃ ca prajñāpāramitā pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā upanāmyeta parikalpam upādāya imām evāhaṃ tayor dvayor (PSP_2-3:88)
S06psp_2-3u:1324: bhāgayoḥ sthāpitayoḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇīyāṃ. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_2-3u:1325: na mama bhagavaṃs teṣu tathāgataśarīreṣv agauravaṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:1326_0: nāhaṃ bhagavaṃs tathāgataśarirāṇi na satkartukāmo na gurukartukāmo na mānayitukāmo
S06psp_2-3u:1326_1: na pūjayitukāmo. api tu khalu punar me bhagavann evaṃ syāt prajñāpāramitānirjātāni
S06psp_2-3u:1326_2: tathāgataśarirāṇi yena tāni satkriyante gurukriyante mānyante pūjyante,
S06psp_2-3u:1327: prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi yena tāni pūjāṃ labhante.

S06psp_2-3u:1439_1: suparipūrṇāni punar jāmbūdvīpakāni maṇiratnāni divyānāṃ maṇiratnānāṃ saṃkhyām api
S06psp_2-3u:1439_2: nopayānti kalām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy upaniśām api nopayānti. tat khalu mahāmaṇiratnaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1439_3: yasmin karaṇḍake tiṣṭhati yadā tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ tasmāt karaṇḍakād utkṣiptaṃ bhavati
S06psp_2-3u:1440: atra tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthitam abhūd iti.
S06psp_2-3u:1441_0: evam etad bhadantānanda yatreyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pṛthivīpradeśe pracariṣyati na tatra
S06psp_2-3u:1441_1: kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā kāyikā vā caitasikā vā duḥkhopadravā manuṣyakṛtā vā
S06psp_2-3u:1441_2: amanuṣyakṛtā vā bhaviṣyanti. mahāmaṇiratnam iti prajñāpāramitāyā etad adhivacanaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1441_3: sarvajñajñānasya ca. kiyantaḥ śakyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā guṇāḥ?
S06psp_2-3u:1442_0: parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi prajñāpāramitāyā guṇāḥ. evaṃ dhyānapāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā
S06psp_2-3u:1442_1: kṣāntipāramitāyā śīlapāramitāyā dānapāramitāyā adhyātmaśūnyatāyā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāḥ
S06psp_2-3u:1442_2: smṛtyupasthānāṃ samyakprahāṇānām ṛddhipādānām indriyāṇāṃ balānāṃ bodhyaṅgānām āryāṣṭāṅgasya (PSP_2-3:95)
S06psp_2-3u:1443_0: mārgasyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ caturṇām āryasatyānām aṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1443_1: ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ sarvasamādhīnāṃ sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ caturṇāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1443_2: vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ sarvajñajñānasyāpi
S06psp_2-3u:1443_3: dharmadhātor api dharmaniyāmatāyās tathatāyā bhūtakoṭer acintyadhātoḥ sarvajñajñānasyaite
S06psp_2-3u:1443_4: guṇā yena parinirvṛtasyāpi tathāgatasya śarīrāṇi pūjāṃ labhante. sarvajñajñānasya
S06psp_2-3u:1443_6: tathāgataśarirāṇi bhājanabhūtāny abhūvaṃs tenaitāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjāṃ labhante.
S06psp_2-3u:1445: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:1446: ratnapāramitāyā bhagavann imāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanam abhūt. asaṃkleśāvyavadānapāramitāyā anutpādānirodhapāramitāyā anāgatipāramitāyā imāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:1449: punar aparaṃ bhagavaṃs tiṣṭhatu trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātus tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ paripūrṇaś cūḍikābaddhaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:1450: saced bhagavan gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavas tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ paripūrṇāś cūḍikābaddhā bhaveyur,
S06psp_2-3u:1451: iyaṃ ca prajñāpāramitā pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā upanāmyeta,
S06psp_2-3u:1452: tayor ahaṃ bhagavan dvayor bhāgayoḥ sthāpitayor imām eva prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇīyāṃ. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_2-3u:1453: ato nirjātāni hi tathāgataśarīrāṇi prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitāni pūjāṃ labhante.
S06psp_2-3u:1454_0: yaḥ punar bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgataśarīrāṇi satkuryād gurukuryāt
S06psp_2-3u:1454_1: mānayet pūjayet sa tasya kuśalamūlasya parittīkṛtāni divyāni mānuṣyakāṇi ca sukhāni
S06psp_2-3u:1454_2: pratyanubhūya kṣatriyamahāśālakuleṣu vā brāhmaṇamahāśālakuleṣu vā gṛhapatimahāśālakuleṣu
S06psp_2-3u:1454_3: vā cāturmahārājakāyikeṣu vā trāyastriṃśeṣu yāmeṣu tuṣiteṣu nirmāṇaratiṣu paranirmitavaśavartiṣu
S06psp_2-3u:1454_4: deveṣu sukhaṃ pratyanubhūya tena kuśalamūlena duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:1455: tasya khalu punaḥ kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇato dhārayato vācayataḥ paryavāpnuvato yoniśaś ca manasikurvato dhyānapāramitā (PSP_2-3:96)
S06psp_2-3u:1456_0: paripūryate dhyānapāramitā paripūrṇā vīryapāramitā paripūryate vīryapāramitā paripūrṇā
S06psp_2-3u:1456_1: kṣāntipāramitā paripūryate kṣāntipāramitā paripurṇā śīlaparamitā paripūryate śīlapāramitā
S06psp_2-3u:1456_2: paripūrṇā dānapāramitā paripūryate dānapāramitā paripūrṇā. evaṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā
S06psp_2-3u:1457: so 'tikramya śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramya bodhisattvābhijñāḥ pratilabhya buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:1459_0: yair ātmabhāvaiḥ sattvān paripācayiṣyati. yadi vā cakravartyātmabhāvaṃ paigṛhya kṣatriya
S06psp_2-3u:1459_1: mahāśālakulātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhya brāhmaṇa mahāśālakulātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhya gṛhapatimahāśālakulātmabhāvaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1459_2: parigṛhya sattvān paripācayiṣyati. tasmād bhagavan na me tathāgataśarīreṣv agauravam
S06psp_2-3u:1459_3: eva me bhagavan nāpi na grahītukāmaḥ. api tu khalu punaḥ prajñāpāramitayā satkṛtayā
S06psp_2-3u:1459_4: gurukṛtayā mānitayā pūjitayā tathāgataśarīrāṇy api satkṛtāni bhavanti gurukṛtāni
S06psp_2-3u:1460_0: punar aparaṃ bhagavan ye daśasu dikṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā asaṃkhyeyeṣv
S06psp_2-3u:1460_1: aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti. tāṃś ca
S06psp_2-3u:1460_2: dharmakāyena ca rūpakāyena ca draṣṭukāmena iyam eva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyodgrahītavyā
S06psp_2-3u:1460_3: dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitavyā yoniśaś
S06psp_2-3u:1460_4: ca manasikartavyā. sacet kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tān daśasu dikṣu tathāgatān arhataḥ
S06psp_2-3u:1461: tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā buddhānusmṛtir bhāvayitavyā.
S06psp_2-3u:1462: dharmatayā dve ime bhagavatāṃ dharmate. katame dve? yad uta saṃskṛtadharmatā cāsaṃskṛtadharmatā ca.
S06psp_2-3u:1464_1: abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatājñānaṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu yad āryasatyeṣu yad
S06psp_2-3u:1465: yac caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsv aṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu (PSP_2-3:97)
S06psp_2-3u:1467: yat kuśalamūleṣu sāsravānāsraveṣu sāvadyānavadyeṣu laukikalokottareṣu saṃkleśavyavadānadharmeṣu jñānam iyam ucyate saṃskṛtadharmatā.
S06psp_2-3u:1469: yasya dharmasya notpādo na nirodho na sthitir nāsthiḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:1470: nānyathātvaṃ na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ na hānir na vṛddhiḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:1471: yāvat sarvadharmāṇām abhāvasvabhāvatā. katamā sarvadharmāṇām abhāvasvabhāvatā?
S06psp_2-3u:1472_0: yā adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā śūnyatāśūnyatā mahāśūnyatā
S06psp_2-3u:1472_3: abhāvaśūnyatā svabhāvaśūnyatā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā parabhāvaśūnyatā. yat sarvadharmāṇāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1472_4: prakṛtiśūnyatātvam anupalambho yāvad yā sarvadharmāṇāṃ nirabhilapyatā apravyāhāratā
S06psp_2-3u:1474: atha khalu bhagavān sakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:1475_0: evam etat kauśikaivam etat. ye 'pi te 'bhūvann atīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās
S06psp_2-3u:1475_1: te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāḥ. ye 'pi
S06psp_2-3u:1475_2: te bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās te 'pīmām eva
S06psp_2-3u:1475_3: prajñāpāramitām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante. ye 'py etarhi daśadiglokadhātuṣu
S06psp_2-3u:1475_4: tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti
S06psp_2-3u:1475_5: te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāḥ. ye 'pi
S06psp_2-3u:1475_6: te 'bhūvann atītānāgatāḥ śrāvakā ye ca pratyekabuddhās te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitām
S06psp_2-3u:1477: ye 'pi sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ prāpsyante prāpnuvanti ca. ye 'pi te daśadiśi loke 'saṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu śrāvakā,
S06psp_2-3u:1478: ye ca pratyekabuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamya śrāvakabodhipratyekabodhiprāptās. tat kasya hetos?
S06psp_2-3u:1481_1: tat punar lokavyavahāreṇa na punaḥ paramārthena. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_2-3u:1482_0: na hi prajñāpāramitāyām apāraṃ vā pāraṃ vā sthalaṃ vā nimnaṃ vā samaṃ vā viṣamaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1482_1: vā nimittaṃ vā animittaṃ vā laukikaṃ vā lokottaraṃ vā saṃskṛtaṃ vā asaṃskṛtaṃ vā
S06psp_2-3u:1482_2: kuśalaṃ vā akuśalaṃ vā atītaṃ vā anāgataṃ vā pratyutpannaṃ vā prajñāyate. na ca kauśika
S06psp_2-3u:1482_3: prajñāpāramitā kasyacid dharmasya pradāyikā na pratyekabuddhadharmāṇāṃ nārhatvadharmāṇāṃ pradāyikā.
S06psp_2-3u:1485: mahāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā. atra hi bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaḥ sarvasattvacittacaritāni prajānanti na ca sattvam upalabhante,
S06psp_2-3u:1486: na jīvaṃ na poṣaṃ na puruṣaṃ na manujaṃ na mānavaṃ na kārakaṃ na vedakaṃ na jānakaṃ na paśyakam upalabhante. na rūpam upalabhante,
S06psp_2-3u:1487: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānam upalabhante. na pṛthivīdhātum upalabhante,
S06psp_2-3u:1488: nābdhātuṃ na tejodhātuṃ na vāyudhātuṃ nākāśadhātuṃ na vijñānadhātum upalabhante. na cakṣur upalabhante,
S06psp_2-3u:1492_0: yad api tac cakṣūrūpasaṃsparśapratyayād utpadyate vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā
S06psp_2-3u:1492_1: aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā tad api nopalabhante. evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvāṃ kāyaṃ mano nopalabhante.
S06psp_2-3u:1493_0: śrotrasaṃsparśaṃ yāvan manaḥsaṃsparśaṃ nopalabhante yāvad yad api tan manodharmasaṃsparśapratyayād
S06psp_2-3u:1493_1: utpadyate vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā tad api nopalabhante. smṛtyupasthānāninopalabhante.
S06psp_2-3u:1493_3: nopalabhante. nāryasatyāni nāṣṭavimokṣān na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīr na ṣaḍabhijñā
S06psp_2-3u:1494: na daśatathāgatabalāni na vaiśāradyāni na pratisaṃvido nāṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān upalabhante. nādhyātmaśūnyatām upalabhante,
S06psp_2-3u:1495_0: na bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ yāvan nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatām upalabhante.
S06psp_2-3u:1495_1: na samādhīn na dhāraṇīmukhāny upalabhante. na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāny upalabhante.
S06psp_2-3u:1495_2: na bodhiṃ na buddhaṃ na buddhadharmān upalabhante. na hi prajñāpāramitā upalambhayogena
S06psp_2-3u:1496: tathā hi svabhāvo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, yenopalabhyeta yad upalabhyeta yatra copalabhyeta.
S06psp_2-3u:1497: bhagavān āha: evam etat kauśikaivam etat,
S06psp_2-3u:1498: tathā hi kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nupalambhayogena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhim api nopalabhate prāg eva bodhisattvadharmān.
S06psp_2-3u:1500: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām eva carati nānyāsu pāramitāsu?
S06psp_2-3u:1502_0: sarvāsu kauśika pāramitāsu bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś carati na kevalaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ.
S06psp_2-3u:1502_1: tac cānupalambhayogena sa dānapāramitāṃ nopalabhate dāyakam api nopalabhate pratigrāhakam api nopalabhate,
S06psp_2-3u:1503: śīlapāramitāṃ nopalabhate śīlavantam api nopalabhate dauḥśīlyam api nopalabhate,
S06psp_2-3u:1504: kṣāntipāramitāṃ nopalabhate kṣamiṇam api nopalabhate kṣamyam api nopalabhate vīryapāramitāṃ nopalabhate kartavyam api nopalabhate kāyacittam api nopalabhate,
S06psp_2-3u:1505: dhyānapāramitāṃ nopalabhate cittam api nopalabhate samādhim api nopalabhate,
S06psp_2-3u:1506_0: prajñāpāramitāṃ nopalabhate prajñāvantam api nopalabhate prajñayam api nopalabhate.
S06psp_2-3u:1506_1: api tu khalu punaḥ kauśika prajñāpāramitā pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
S06psp_2-3u:1506_2: dānaṃ dadataḥ. prajñāpāramitā pūrvaṃgamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlaṃ rakṣataḥ
S06psp_2-3u:1506_3: kṣāntiṃ bhāvayato vīryam ārambhamāṇasya dhyānaṃ samāpadyamānasya dharmān vibhāvayato
S06psp_2-3u:1506_4: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā sarvadharmāṇām anupalambhayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:1507_2: ṣaṇṇām abhijñānām anupalambhayogena. daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1507_3: catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇām anupalambhayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:1507_5: anupalambhayogena yāvat sarvadharmāṇām anupalambhayogena. tadyathāpi nāma kauśika
S06psp_2-3u:1507_7: na ca teṣāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ cchāyāyā viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ copalabhyate,
S06psp_2-3u:1508_0: api tu cchāyā cchāyeti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati. evam eva kauśika pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1508_1: sarvajñātāpariṇāmitānāṃ na viśeṣo na nānākaraṇam upalabhyate 'nupalambhayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:1509: iti parārthādhimuktir adhimātrādhimātrety ukto adhimuktimanaskāraḥ guṇaparikīrtanaparivarto nāma caturthaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:1510: śakra āha: mahāguṇasamanvāgatā bhagavann iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_2-3u:1511_2: kaścid bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitām api
S06psp_2-3u:1512: tāṃ ca satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhir yathopadiṣṭāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāṃ yoniśo manasikuryād,
S06psp_2-3u:1513: yaś ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parasmai dadyāt,
S06psp_2-3u:1516: tena hi kauśika tvām evātra pratiprakṣyāmi yathā te kṣamate tathā vyākuryāḥ. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_2-3u:1518: yaḥ kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgataśarīrāṇi satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayet puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:1519: yaś ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā sarṣapaphalamātrakaṃ tathāgataśarīraṃ parasmai dadyāt saṃvibhāgaṃ kuryāt,
S06psp_2-3u:1520: so 'pi kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tat sarṣapaphalamātrakaṃ (PSP_2-3:101)
S06psp_2-3u:1524: yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārtham ājāneyāyaṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgataśarīrāṇi svayaṃ satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed arcayed apacāyeta,

S06psp_2-3u:1525_1: puṇyaṃ prasavet. evam arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyamānena tathāgatena vajropamaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadya

S06psp_2-3u:2252_0: prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītāḥ pañcapāramitā pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante. na ca bhadanta
S06psp_2-3u:2252_1: śariputra dānapāramitāparigṛhītāḥ pañcapāramitāḥ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante. evaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2254_0: evam etat kauśikaivam etat. na dānapāramitāparigṛhītāḥ kauśika pañcapāramitāḥ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2254_1: labhante. evaṃ na śīlakṣāntivīryadhyānapāramitāparigṛhītāḥ kauśika pañcapāramitāḥ
S06psp_2-3u:2254_2: pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante. tasmāt tarhi kauśika prajñāpāramitaiva pañcānāṃ pāramitānām
S06psp_2-3u:2254_3: agrā ākhyāyate śreṣṭhā ākhyāyate jyeṣṭhā ākhyāyate varā ākhyāyate pravarā ākhyāyate
S06psp_2-3u:2254_4: uttamā ākhyāyate anuttamā ākhyāyate asamā ākhyāyate asamasamā ākhyāyate.
S06psp_2-3u:2256: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat: kathaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavyā?
S06psp_2-3u:2258_1: saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyānabhinirhārāyā prajñāpāramiṭābhinirhartvyā. evaṃ dhātūnām āyatanānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2260: śariputra āha: kathaṃ bhagavan rūpasyānabhinirhārāya prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavyā?
S06psp_2-3u:2265: śāriputra āha: evam abhinirhṛtā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā katamaṃ dharmam arpayati?
S06psp_2-3u:2266: bhagavān āha: evam abhinirhṛtā śāriputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃcid dharmam arpayati,
S06psp_2-3u:2267: yato na kaṃcid dharmam arpayati tasmāt prajñāpāramiteti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati.
S06psp_2-3u:2270_0: na kuśalaṃ dharmam arpayati nākuśalaṃ dharmam arpayati. evaṃ na sāvadyaṃ nānavadyaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2270_1: na sāsravaṃ nānāsravaṃ na saṃskṛtaṃ nāsaṃskṛtaṃ na saṃkleśaṃ na niḥkleśaṃ na laukikaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2270_2: na lokottaraṃ na saṃkliṣṭaṃ na vyavadānaṃ na saṃsāraṃ na nirvāṇam arpayati. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_2-3u:2271: na hi prajñāpāramitā kasyacid dharmasyopalambhayogena pratyupasthitā tena kāraṇena na kaṃcid dharmam arpayati.
S06psp_2-3u:2272: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:2273: kim iyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā sarvākārajñatām api nārpayati?
S06psp_2-3u:2274: bhagavān āha: yat kauśika evaṃ vadasi,
S06psp_2-3u:2275: kim iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā sarvākārajñatām api nārpayatīti. evam etat kauśikaivam etat,
S06psp_2-3u:2276: prajñāpāramitā kauśika na kaṃcid dharmam arpayati nopalabhate sarvākārajñatām api nārpayati nopalabhate.
S06psp_2-3u:2277: devendra āha: kathaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā sarvākārajñatām api nārpayati nopalabhate?
S06psp_2-3u:2278: bhagavān āha: na hi kauśika prajñāpramitā yathā nāma yathā nimittaṃ yathābhisaṃskāras tathārpayati.
S06psp_2-3u:2279: devendra āha: kathaiḥ punar bhagavann arpayati?
S06psp_2-3u:2280: bhagavān āha: yathā nopaiti nopādadāti nadhitiṣṭhati na prajahāti nābhiniviśate (PSP_2-3:146)
S06psp_2-3u:2281: tathārpayati yathā na kaṃcid dharmam arpayati muñcati na pratigṛhṇāti. evaṃ hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā sarvadharmān nārpayati na muñcati na pratigṛhṇāti.
S06psp_2-3u:2283: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā sarvadharmāṇām anutpādāya anirodhāya anabhisaṃskārāya anupalabdhaye avināśāya pratyupasthitā.
S06psp_2-3u:2284: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:2285: saced bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evaṃ saṃjñāsyati,
S06psp_2-3u:2287: riñciṣyati bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ dūrīkariṣyati bhagavan prajñāpāramitām.
S06psp_2-3u:2289_0: asti subhūte paryāyo yena paryāyeṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo riñcan prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2289_1: dūrīkuryān prajñāpāramitām. saced bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evaṃ saṃjñāsyati,
S06psp_2-3u:2290: rikteyaṃ prajñāpāramiteyaṃ tucchā asārā vaśikeyaṃ prajñāpāramiteti,
S06psp_2-3u:2291_0: riñciṣyati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ dūrīkariṣyati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:2291_1: prajñāpāramitām. ayaṃ subhūte paryāyo yena paryāyeṇa riñciṣyati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:2292: subhūtir āha: prajñāpāramitayā bhagavan pratyarpitayā katame dharmāḥ pratyarpitā bhavanti?
S06psp_2-3u:2293: bhagavān āha: prajñāpāramitayā subhūte pratyarpitayā na rūpaṃ pratyarpitaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_2-3u:2294: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ na vijñānaṃ pratyarpitaṃ bhavati. na cakṣuḥ pratyarpitaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_2-3u:2295: na śrotraṃ na ghrāṇaṃ na jihvā na kāyo na manaḥ pratyarpitaṃ bhavati. na rūpaṃ pratyarpitaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_2-3u:2296: na śabdo na gandho na raso na spraṣṭavyaṃ na dharmāḥ pratyarpitā bhavanti. na dānapāramitā pratyarpitā bhavati,
S06psp_2-3u:2297_0: na śīlapāramitā na kṣāntipāramitā na vīryapāramitā na dhyānapāramitā na prajñāpāramitā
S06psp_2-3u:2297_1: pratyarpitā bhavati. nādhyātmaśūnyatā pratyarpitā bhavati. na bahirdhāśūnyatā pratyarpitā
S06psp_2-3u:2297_2: bhavati. nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā pratyarpitā bhavati yāvan nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā
S06psp_2-3u:2297_3: pratyarpitā bhavati. na saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ pratyarpitā bhavanti. na
S06psp_2-3u:2297_4: daśabalavaiśāradyāni na pratisaṃvido nāṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ pratyarpitā bhavanti.
S06psp_2-3u:2297_5: na srotaāpattiphalṃ pratyarpitaṃ bhavati. na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ pratyarpitaṃ bhavati.
S06psp_2-3u:2297_6: nānāgāmiphalaṃ pratyarpitaṃ bhavati. nārhattvaṃ pratyarpitaṃ bhavati. na pratyekabuddhatvaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2297_7: pratyarpitaṃ bhavati. nānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ pratyarpitā bhavati.
S06psp_2-3u:2300: kathaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitayā pratyarpitayā na rūpaṃ pratyarpitaṃ bhavati yāvad na sarvākārajñatā pratyarpitā bhavati?
S06psp_2-3u:2302_0: rūpasya subhūte 'nupalabdhyā prajñāpāramitā pratyarpitā bhavati yāvat sarvākārajñatānupalabdhyā
S06psp_2-3u:2302_1: prajñāpāramitā pratyarpitā bhavati. evaṃ khalu subhūte prajñāpāramitayā pratyarpitayā
S06psp_2-3u:2302_2: na rūpaṃ pratyarpitaṃ bhavati yāvad na sarvākārajñatā pratyarpita bhavati.
S06psp_2-3u:2304: subhūtir āha: mahāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_2-3u:2305: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte katamena paryāyeṇa mahāpāramiteyaṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_2-3u:2306: subhūtir āha: na bhagavan rūpaṃ mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti,
S06psp_2-3u:2307_0: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti. evaṃ dhātūn āyatanāni
S06psp_2-3u:2307_1: pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni na mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti. na dānapāramitāṃ mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti.
S06psp_2-3u:2307_2: evaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntiṃ vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ na prajñāpāramitāṃ mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti. nādhyātmaśūnyatāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2307_3: mahatkaroti nālpīkatoti yāvan nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti. na
S06psp_2-3u:2307_4: saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti. nāryasatyāni nāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīḥ
S06psp_2-3u:2307_5: na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni nābhijñā mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti. na tathāgatabalāni
S06psp_2-3u:2307_6: na vaiśāradyāni na pratisaṃvido nāṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti.
S06psp_2-3u:2307_7: na bodhiṃ mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti. na buddhadharmaṃ mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti. yāvan
S06psp_2-3u:2307_8: na buddhaṃ mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti. na rūpaṃ vipulīkaroti na parittīkaroti. na rūpaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2307_9: balavatkaroti na durbalīkaroti. anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2307_10: mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā. sacet punar navayānasaṃprasthito bodhisattvo
S06psp_2-3u:2307_11: mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitām āgamya dhyānapāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2307_12: śīlapāramitāṃ dānapāramitām āgamya evaṃ jñāsyati na prajñāpāramitā rūpaṃ mahatkaroti
S06psp_2-3u:2307_13: nālpīkaroti yāvan na buddhadharmaṃ mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti. na rūpaṃ balavatkaroti
S06psp_2-3u:2307_14: na durbalīkaroti. evaṃ saṃjānan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_2-3u:2308: naiṣa bhagavan niṣyandaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ. yad rūpaṃ mahad alpaṃ vā kuryād yāvad buddhadharmaṃ mahad alpaṃ vā kuryān naiṣa prajñāpāramitāyā niṣyandaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_2-3u:2309: na hy upalambhasaṃjñino bodhisattvās tathā sattvājātitayā prajñāpāramitā draṣṭavyā. rūpājātitaḥ prajñāpāramitājātitā (PSP_2-3:148)
S06psp_2-3u:2310_0: draṣṭavyā. vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānājātitaḥ prajñāpāramitājātitā draṣṭavyā yāvad
S06psp_2-3u:2310_3: vijñānāsvabhāvatayā prajñāpāramitāsvabhāvatā draṣṭayyā yāvad buddhāsvabhāvatayā prajñāpāramitāsvabhāvatā
S06psp_2-3u:2310_4: draṣṭavyā. rūpābhāvatayā prajñāpāramitābhāvatā veditavyā. vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānābhāvatayā
S06psp_2-3u:2310_5: prajñāpāramitābhāvatā veditavyā yāvad buddhābhāvatayā prajñāpāramitābhāvatā veditavyā.
S06psp_2-3u:2310_6: sattvaśūnyatayā prajñāpāramitā śūnyatā veditavyā. rūpaśūnyatayā prajñāpāramitā śūnyatā
S06psp_2-3u:2310_7: veditavyā. vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānaśūnyatayā prajñāpāramitā śūnyatā veditavyā
S06psp_2-3u:2310_8: yāvad buddhaśūnyatayā prajñāpāramitā śūnyata veditavyā. evaṃ sattvānimittatayā sattvāpraṇihitatayā
S06psp_2-3u:2310_19: veditavyā yāvad buddhabalāsamanvāgatatayā prajñāpāramitā balāsamanvāgatatā vedjtavyā.
S06psp_2-3u:2310_20: anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_2-3u:2312: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:2313: yo 'yaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitām adhimokṣyate,
S06psp_2-3u:2315: kiyaccirasaṃprasthitaḥ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā abhūd anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
S06psp_2-3u:2323: kiyacciraṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carito ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām arthataś ca nayataś cādhimokṣyate?
S06psp_2-3u:2324: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:2325: sa khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo daśasu dikṣu tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān paryupāsyehāgata ihopapanno bhaviṣyati. iti buddhasevā
S06psp_2-3u:2326: yaḥ khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'saṃkhyeyāny aprameyāṇi kalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi samudāgato 'bhūd anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06psp_2-3u:2327_0: sa prathamacittotpādam upādāya dānapāramitāyāṃ caritaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ caritaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2327_1: carito vīryapāramitāyāṃ carito dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caritaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:2327_2: sann ihāgato bhaviṣyati. sa khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā
S06psp_2-3u:2327_3: dṛṣṭayā śrutayā vā śāstā mayā dṛṣṭa iti cittam utpādayiṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:2328: śāstā mayā śruta iti cittam utpādayiṣyati. sa khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ prajñāpāramitām arthataś ca nayataś cādhigamiṣyaty animittādvayānupalambhayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:2329: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:2330: śakyā punar bhagavan prajñāpāramitā draṣṭuṃ vā śrotuṃ vā?
S06psp_2-3u:2332_0: no hīdaṃ subhūte na hi subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāḥ śrotāro draṣṭāro na prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2332_1: te paśyanti na śṛṇvanti dharmajaḍatām upādaya. evaṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2332_2: kṣāntipāramitāṃ śīlapāramitāṃ dānapāramitāṃ te na paśyanti na śṛṇvanti dharmajaḍatām
S06psp_2-3u:2332_3: upādāya. adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ na paśyanti na śṛṇvanti dharmajaḍatām
S06psp_2-3u:2332_4: upādāya. smṛtyupasthānāni na paśyanti na śṛṇvanti dharmajaḍatām upādāya. evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgān
S06psp_2-3u:2332_5: na paśyanti na śṛṇvanti dharmajaḍatām upādāya. evam āryasatyāny apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:2332_7: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān na paśyanti
S06psp_2-3u:2332_8: na śṛṇvanti. buddhabodhiṃ na paśyanti na śṛṇvanti dharmajaḍatām upādāya.
S06psp_2-3u:2334: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:2335: kiyacciraṃ caritaḥ sa bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhaviṣyati ya iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpatsyate?
S06psp_2-3u:2338_0: syāt subhūte paryāyo yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya gambhīrāyāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2338_1: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate. evaṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2338_2: śīlapāramitāyāṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate. tac copāyakauśalena na ca kaṃcid
S06psp_2-3u:2338_3: dharmaṃ pratikṣipati yathā nopacayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:2339: na jātu ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir virahito bhavati na buddhair bhagavadbhir,
S06psp_2-3u:2340_0: yaiś ca pūjāviśeṣair ākāṅkṣet tān buddhān bhagavataḥ satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2340_1: pūjayituṃ tasya te pūjāviśeṣāḥ sahacittotpādenaiva saṃṛdhyante. buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2340_2: saṃkrāmati. na jātu mātuḥ kukṣāv upapadyate. na ca jātu virahito bhavati abhijñābhir.
S06psp_2-3u:2340_3: na ca kenacit kleśena sārdhaṃ saṃvasati. na śrāvakacittena na pratyekabuddhacittena
S06psp_2-3u:2340_4: sārdhaṃ saṃvasati. buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmati sattvāṃś ca paripācayan
S06psp_2-3u:2340_5: buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayan. ayaṃ subhūte bobhisattvo mahāsattvo yo 'syāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2340_6: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ prathamacittotpādam upādāya yogam āpatsyate. ity upāyakauśalam
S06psp_2-3u:2341_0: santi punaḥ subhūte mahāyānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca yair bahūni buddhaśatāni
S06psp_2-3u:2341_1: bahūni buddhasahasrāṇi bahūni buddhaśatasahasrāṇi bahūni buddhakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi
S06psp_2-3u:2341_2: dṛṣṭāni bhavanti. tebhyaś cāntike śikṣamāṇair dānāni dattāni bhavanti,
S06psp_2-3u:2342_0: śīlaṃ rakṣitaṃ kṣāntir bhāvitā vīryam ārabdhaṃ dhyānam āsevitaṃ prajñā bhāvitā bhavati
S06psp_2-3u:2342_1: sā copalambhayogena. te 'syāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ parṣaḍbhyo
S06psp_2-3u:2342_2: 'pakramiṣyanti. te punaḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś cāgauravatayāsyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ

S06psp_2-3u:2348_0: dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ vidikṣūrdhvam adho diśi yo mahānirayās teṣu prakṣepsyante.
S06psp_2-3u:2348_1: tebhyo 'pi punaḥ saṃvartanīṣu prādurbhūtāsv anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu ye mahānirayās teṣu

S06psp_2-3u:2348_4: te punar eva mahānirayān mahānirayaṃ saṃkramiṣyanti. te teṣu mahānirayeṣūpapannā

S06psp_2-3u:2348_7: saṃvartanīṣu prādurbhūtāsv itaś cyutā anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu punar eva mahānirayeṣūpapatsyante.

S06psp_2-3u:2348_10: kṣepayiṣyanti. te bahuduḥkhavedanīyaṃ karma kṣepayitvā kadācit karhicit mānuṣyakam

S06psp_2-3u:2348_12: jātyandhakuleṣūpapatsyante. caṇḍālakuleṣu vā puṣkasakuleṣu vā śākunikuleṣu vā sukarikuleṣu

S06psp_2-3u:2349: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:2350: pañca bhagavann ānantaryāṇy asya dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyasya karmaṇaḥ kṛtasyopacitasya prativarṇikā api na bhavanti?
S06psp_2-3u:2352: prativarṇiketi śāriputra na vaktavyāsya dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyakarmaṇaḥ kṛtasyopacitasya. ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ pratibādhitavyāṃ maṃsyante,
S06psp_2-3u:2353: nātra śikṣitavyaṃ naiṣa dharmo naiṣa vinayo naitac (PSP_2-3:152)
S06psp_2-3u:2354: chāstuḥ śāsanaṃ naitat tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair bhāṣitam iti bhāṣyante,
S06psp_2-3u:2356_0: anyāṃś ca sattvān vivecayiṣyanti. te svasaṃtānāny upahatya parasaṃtānāny upahantavyāni
S06psp_2-3u:2356_1: maṃsyante. te svasaṃtānaṃ saviṣaṃ kṛtvā parasaṃtānāny api saviṣāṇi kariṣyanti. te
S06psp_2-3u:2356_2: svayaṃ naṣṭāḥ. parān api nāśayiṣyanti. svayaṃ ca gambhīrāṃ prajñāramitām ajānanto

S06psp_2-3u:2358_0: dharmadūṣakā hi te śāriputra tathārūpāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ kaśaṃbakajātīyāḥ kṛṣṇā
S06psp_2-3u:2358_1: hi jātayaḥ śāriputra tathārūpāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ. teṣāṃ khalu punaḥ śāriputra tathārūpāṇāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2358_2: pudgalānāṃ ye śrotavyaṃ śraddhātavyaṃ maṃsyante te 'nayena vyasanam āpatsyante. yaś
S06psp_2-3u:2358_3: cemāṃ śāriputra prajñāpāramitāṃ dūṣayiṣyati dharmadūṣakaḥ sa pudgalo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:2360: na khalu punar bhagavaṃs tasya dharmadūṣakasya pudgalasya bhagavatā tatropapannasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇam ākhyātam.
S06psp_2-3u:2362: tiṣṭhatu śāriputra tasya dharmadūṣakasya pudgalasya tatropapannasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_2-3u:2363: mā tasya dharmadūṣakasya pudgalasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇaṃ śrutvā uṣṇaṃ rudhiraṃ mukhād āgacchet,
S06psp_2-3u:2365: duḥkhaṃ śrutvā śokaśalpasamarpito vā bhavet. ucchoṣyed vā mlāyed vā nīlo vā harito vā lūno vā yāvad idaṃ tasya dharmadūṣakasya pudgalasya dṛśasyātmabhāvapratilābhasya pramāṇam iti,
S06psp_2-3u:2366: yasyāyam īdṛśo doṣaḥ saṃvidyata iti. na bhagavān āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyāvakāśaṃ karotīdaṃ tasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti.
S06psp_2-3u:2368: ākhyātu bhagavān paścimāyā janatāyā ālokāḥ kṛto bhaviṣyaty anena dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇā kṛtenopacitena dharmadūṣakāḥ pudgalā īdṛśam ātmabhāvaṃ parigrahīṣyantīti.
S06psp_2-3u:2370_0: evam eva śāriputra paścimāyā janatāyā ālokaḥ kṛto bhaviṣyaty anenāsau dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyena
S06psp_2-3u:2370_1: karmaṇā kṛtenopacitena mahānirayeṣu duḥkham anubhaviṣyati. yā etasyaiva duḥkhasyāpramāṇatā
S06psp_2-3u:2371_0: eṣa eva śuklāṃśikasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā tebhyo dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyebhyaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:2371_1: karmabhyo nirvṛttir bhaviṣyati. te jivitahetor api dharmaṃ na pratikṣepsyanti. mā
S06psp_2-3u:2371_2: bhūd asmākam īdṛśair duḥkhaiḥ samavadhānam iti.
S06psp_2-3u:2372: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: susaṃvṛtakāyavāgmanaskarmaṇā (PSP_2-3:153)

S06psp_2-3u:2375_3: maṃsyante. prajñāpāramitayā subhūte dūṣitayā pratibādhitayā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ

S06psp_2-3u:2376_1: bhagavatāṃ sarvajñatā dūṣitā bhavati pratibādhitā. sarvajñatayā dūṣitayā pratibādhitayā
S06psp_2-3u:2376_2: dharmaḥ. pratibādhito bhavati. dharmeṇa pratibādhitena saṃghaḥ. pratibādhito bhavati.
S06psp_2-3u:2376_3: saṃghena pratibādhitena laukikī samyagdṛṣṭir lokottarā ca samyakdṛṣṭiḥ pratibādhitā

S06psp_2-3u:2383_2: caturbhir ākāraiḥ samanvāgatās te mohapuruṣā gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pratikṣepsyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:2385: duradhimocyā bhagavan gambhīrā prajñāpāramitānabhiyuktena kuśalamūlavirahitena pāpamitrahastagatena.
S06psp_2-3u:2387: evam etat subhūte duradhimocyā gambhīrā prajñāpāramitānabhiyuktaiḥ kuśalamūlavirahitaiḥ pāpamitrahastagataiḥ.

S06psp_2-3u:2652: atha khalu śakro devānām indraḥ sthaviraṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:2653: katamena bhadanta subhūte paryāyeṇa bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṅgo bhavati?

S06psp_2-3u:2662_6: sarvākārajñatāyāḥ prakṛtiḥ. śakyā pariṇāmayitum. iti punarvipakṣaḥ.

S06psp_2-3u:2688: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim āmantrayāmāsa:

S06psp_2-3u:2754: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:

S06psp_2-3u:2773: duṣkarakārako bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ na saṃsīdati,

S06psp_2-3u:2779: na dhyānapāramitā na vīryapāramitā na kṣāntipāramitā na śīlapāramitā na dānapāramitā prajñāyate. nākāśe rūpaṃ prajñāyate,

S06psp_2-3u:2784_3: prajñāyante. nākāśe śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñāḥ prajñāyante. nākāśe samādhidhāraṇīmukhāni
S06psp_2-3u:2784_4: prajñāyante. nākāśe samādhidhāraṇīmukhāni prajñāyante. nākāśe śamathavipaśyanā prajñāyate.

S06psp_2-3u:2786_0: namaskaromi bhagavan bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyo yair ayaṃ saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ.

S06psp_2-3u:2786_2: saṃnāhaṃ saṃnahyante. ākāśaṃ te bhagavan parimocayitukāmā ye sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2786_3: saṃnahyante. mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhās te bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye ākāśasamānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2786_4: dharmāṇāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ saṃnahyante. ity uddeśaduṣkaratāprayogaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:2787: ākāśaṃ te bhagavann antarīkṣam utkṣeptukāmā ye sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ saṃnahyante. iti prayogaduṣkaratāprayogaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:2788: mahāvīryapāramitāprāptās te bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye sattvānāṃ kṛtaśo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbodhukāmāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_2-3u:2789: saced bhagavann ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātus tathāgataiḥ paripūrṇaḥ syāt,
S06psp_2-3u:2790: tadyathāpi nāma naḍasvanaṃ vā veṇuvanaṃ vā ikṣuvanaṃ vā śaravanaṃ vā śālivanaṃ vā,
S06psp_2-3u:2791: te tathāgatāḥ kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā dharmaṃ deśayeyuḥ,

S06psp_2-3u:2795: sattvaviviktatām upādāya. evam ekaikasyāṃ diśi yāvad daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātavas tathāgataiḥ paripūrṇā (PSP_2-3:175)
S06psp_2-3u:2797: tadyathāpi nāma naḍavanaṃ vā veṇuvanaṃ vā ikṣuvanaṃ vā śaravanaṃ vā śālivanaṃ vā,
S06psp_2-3u:2798: te ca tathāgatās tiṣṭhantaḥ kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā dharmaṃ deśayeyuḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:2799: ekaikaś ca tathāgato 'prameyān asaṃkhyeyān aparimāṇān sattvān parinirvāpayet,
S06psp_2-3u:2800: na ca bhagavan sattvadhātor ūnatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā prajñāyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_2-3u:2802: sattvaviviktatām upādāya. anena bhagavan paryāyeṇaivaṃ vadāmi;
S06psp_2-3u:2803: ākāśaṃ te bhagavan parimocayitukāmā ye sattvānāṃ kṛtaśo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbodhukāmāḥ. iti kāritraduṣkaratāprayogaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:2804: atha khalv anyatarasya bhikṣor etad abhavat:
S06psp_2-3u:2805: namaskaromi bhagavan bhagavatyai prajñāpāramitāyai yatra na kaścid dharma upalabhyate na nirudhyate,
S06psp_2-3u:2820: atha khalu śakro devānām indra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:2821: yo bhadanta subhūte gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yogam āpatsyate kva yogam āpatsyate?
S06psp_2-3u:2823: ākāśe sa kauśika yogam āpatsyate yo 'tra gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ maṃsyate.
S06psp_2-3u:2824: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:2825_0: yo bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati
S06psp_2-3u:2825_1: vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati kāmam ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tasya rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyāmi.
S06psp_2-3u:2826: subhūtir āha: samanupaśyasi tvaṃ kauśika taṃ dharmaṃ yasya rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhātum icchasi?
S06psp_2-3u:2827: śakra āha: nāhaṃ bhadanta subhūte taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yasya rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyāmi.
S06psp_2-3u:2829: sacet kauśika kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthāsyanti saivaiṣāṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptir bhaviṣyati. atha (PSP_2-3:176)
S06psp_2-3u:2830: virahitā bhaviṣyanti yathopadiṣṭayā prajñāpāramitayā lapsyante teṣāṃ manuṣyāś cāmanuṣyāś cāvatāram. ākāśasya sa kauśika rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhātavyāṃ manyeta,
S06psp_2-3u:2831: yo bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratāṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhātavyāṃ manyeta. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_2-3u:2835: evam eva kauśika yo bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratāṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhātavyāṃ manyeta,
S06psp_2-3u:2836: sa yāvad eva vighātasya klamathasya ca bhāgī syāt tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_2-3u:2837: kauśika pratibalas tvaṃ tathāgatasya vā tathāgatanirmitasya vā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhātum.
S06psp_2-3u:2840_0: evam etat kauśika yo bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratāṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2840_1: saṃvidhātavyāṃ manyeta sa yāvad eva vighatasya klamathasya ca bhāgī syāt. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_2-3u:2841: kauśika pratibalastvaṃ dharmadhātor bhūtakoṭes tathatāyā acintyadhāto rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhātum.

S06psp_2-3u:2844_1: saṃvidhātavyāṃ manyeta sa yāvad eva vighatasya klamathasya ca bhāgī syāt. ity aparapratyayaprayogaḥ

S06psp_2-3u:2854: tadā bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiḥ svapnopamāḥ sarvadharmā yāvan nirmitopamāś ca sarvadharmāḥ parijñātā bhavanti. iti saptavidhābhijñānaprayoga ity uktaḥ prayogaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:2855: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran (PSP_2-3:177)
S06psp_2-3u:2870_0: vijñāne 'pi na manyate. evaṃ vyastasamastāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanāni pratityasamutpādaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:2881: nirmite 'pi na manyate. ity uktā prayogasamatā
S06psp_2-3u:2882_0: atha khalu buddhānubhāvena ye 'smiṃs trisāhasre mahāsāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā
S06psp_2-3u:2882_1: devās trāyastriṃṣā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino brahmapārṣadyā

S06psp_2-3u:2885: atha khalu catvāro mahārājānaḥ śakraś ca brahmāṇaś ca yāvac chuddhāvāsakāyikāś ca devaputrā buddhānubhāvena buddhasahasraṃ samanvāharanti sma,

S06psp_2-3u:2893: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:2894: katamair bhagavann ākāraiḥ katamair liṅgaiḥ katamair nimittair maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣiṣyate?
S06psp_2-3u:2896: iha subhūte maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya na rūpaṃ nityam anityaṃ veti dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati. evaṃ na sukhaṃ na duḥkhaṃ nātmā nānātmā,
S06psp_2-3u:2897_0: na rūpaṃ śubham aśubhaṃ veti dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati. na rūpaṃ baddhaṃ muktaṃ veti dharmaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2897_1: deśayiṣyati. evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā na vijñānaṃ nityam anityaṃ veti dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:2897_2: evaṃ na sukhaṃ na duḥkhaṃ nātmā nānātmā na vijñānaṃ śubham aśubhaṃ veti dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati.

S06psp_2-3u:2897_9: buddhadharmeṣu yāvat sarvajñatā nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpanneti evaṃ dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati.

S06psp_2-3u:2899: kathaṃ punar bhagavan maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyatīti?
